K10D0353_H0361:135b-0: @135b / /rgya yi skad du de'i phung bya na lhur po'u ain kyeng s'u phim de'i ayir /

K10D0353_H0361:137a-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
K10D0353_H0361:137a-5: la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang yang thabs gcig
K10D0353_H0361:137a-6: tu bzhugs so // de ma yin pa /
K10D0353_H0361:137a-8: 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu tshad med pa brgya stong dag kyang lhags nas /
K10D0353_H0361:137a-9: lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /
K10D0353_H0361:137a-10: spos rnams thogs shing lha rdzas kyi rol mo dkrol nas /
K10D0353_H0361:137a-11: steng gi nam mkha' la 'khod do //
K10D0353_H0361:137a-12: de ma yin pa lha dang /
K10D0353_H0361:137a-21: de la sogs pa so so nas 'khor brgya stong snyed lhags nas /
K10D0353_H0361:137a-22: sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10D0353_H0361:137a-24: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das la 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor te /
K10D0353_H0361:137a-27: bkur sdi dang bcas pas yongs su bstod pa byas so //
K10D0353_H0361:137a-28: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs
K10D0353_H0361:137a-29: kyis kun dga' bo snga dro'i dus kyi tshe rgyal
K10D0353_H0361:137a-31: mthar gyis bsod snyams blangs so //
K10D0353_H0361:137a-32: de'i dus na bram ze pha ma la sre zhu cher byed pa /
K10D0353_H0361:137a-33: khyim so zhig nas ci yang mi bdog pa /
K10D0353_H0361:137b-0: chig rkyang ma rgan khur @137b du khyer te mthar gyis slong mo byed de /
K10D0353_H0361:137b-1: de yang kha zas zhi ma po ro dang ldan pa'am /
K10D0353_H0361:137b-2: shing rtog bzang po dag snyed na /
K10D0353_H0361:137b-4: kha zas ngan po ro med pa'am /

K10D0353_H0361:137b-6: kun dga' bos de lta bu dag ma thong nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te /
K10D0353_H0361:137b-8: legs so zhes snyan par bstod nas /
K10D0353_H0361:137b-10: pha ma la sri zhu byed cing mchod pa byed pa ngo mtshar che ste /
K10D0353_H0361:137b-12: de nas kun tu rgyu ston pa drug gi bstan
K10D0353_H0361:137b-13: pa la phyogs shing grogs su gyur pa gcig dbang
K10D0353_H0361:137b-14: po rno la gtsug lag dang /
K10D0353_H0361:137b-15: rig byed rnam pa bzhi la mkhas par gyur pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:137b-18: dge sdig gi ltas rno ba /
K10D0353_H0361:137b-20: gtsug lag gi rigs pas pha rol gyis sems shes
K10D0353_H0361:137b-21: pa; pha la mang po'i slob dpon du gyur pa
K10D0353_H0361:137b-22: / kun gyis bkur ba gcig lta ba ngan pa la zhen nas /
K10D0353_H0361:137b-24: grags pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'jig par byed do //
K10D0353_H0361:137b-27: dge 'dun la phrag dog byed de /
K10D0353_H0361:137b-28: smod pa'i phyir kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:137b-29: khyod kyi ston pa goo ta ma shaka rigs kyi bu nga ni dge pa yin te /
K10D0353_H0361:137b-30: yon tan chen po dang ldan no zhes smra ba yang ming tsam du zad de /
K10D0353_H0361:137b-31: bden pa'i dngos po med do //
K10D0353_H0361:137b-32: khyod kyi ston pa goo ta ma ni yang dag par na sdig pa can yin te /
K10D0353_H0361:138a-0: btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa na @138a *//
K10D0353_H0361:138a-1: ma yang shi bas sdig can yin par mngon no //
K10D0353_H0361:138a-2: rgyal po'i pho brang na 'dug pa las /
K10D0353_H0361:138a-3: pho brang nang nas bros pas yab rgyal po yang mya ngan gyis non to //
K10D0353_H0361:138a-4: sems 'khrugs nas brgyal ba las chus gtor te /
K10D0353_H0361:138a-5: zhag bdun lon pa dang dran pa phyir rnyed de /
K10D0353_H0361:138a-6: cho nges btab nas nga'i lha'i bu gcig deng du
K10D0353_H0361:138a-7: stor ro zhes snying rje rje skad du dus nas
K10D0353_H0361:138a-8: nga'i yul dang / srid kyang khyod 'ba' zhig dbang
K10D0353_H0361:138a-9: bar zad la bu yang khyod gcig pur zad na
K10D0353_H0361:138a-10: ci'i phyir nged spangs te ri dgon par chas zhes
K10D0353_H0361:138a-12: khyod kyi ston pa go ta ma drin mi shes te /
K10D0353_H0361:138a-13: ci la yang ma ltas par langs te song bas na sri zhu med par yang mngon no //
K10D0353_H0361:138a-14: yab rgyal bos pho brang brtsigs nas chung ma blangs pa las kyang chung ma'i las ma byas te /
K10D0353_H0361:138a-15: mya ngan gyis gdungs par byas pas na /
K10D0353_H0361:138a-16: khrel med pa yang yin par mngon no //
K10D0353_H0361:138a-17: kun dga' bos de skad ces smras pa'i tshig de dag thos nas /
K10D0353_H0361:138a-18: ngo tsha zhing skyengs te bsod snyoms blangs te phyir sangs rgyas gang na bar 'ongs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:138a-19: zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10D0353_H0361:138a-20: phyogs gcig tu thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10D0353_H0361:138a-21: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:138a-23: sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i chos la pha ma la sri zhu bgyi ba lta ma mchis sam /
K10D0353_H0361:138a-24: sangs rgyas kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0353_H0361:138b-0: 'di skad du @138b zhu ba 'di khyod la su zhig gis bstan /
K10D0353_H0361:138b-3: mi ma yin pas bstan tam /
K10D0353_H0361:138b-4: 'on te khyod nyid kyi shes pa'i blos de bzhin
K10D0353_H0361:138b-5: gshegs pa la zhu bar gyur ces bka' stsal pa
K10D0353_H0361:138b-6: dang; kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K10D0353_H0361:138b-11: mi ma lags pa gang gis kyang bstan pa ma mchis te /
K10D0353_H0361:138b-12: snga dro bsod snyoms slong du mchis pa'i shul du /
K10D0353_H0361:138b-13: ston pa drug gi 'khor kun tu rgyu gcer bu pa zhig dang mjal ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:138b-14: bdag la tshig rtsub mo dag mchi'o //
K10D0353_H0361:138b-16: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad nas; zhal
K10D0353_H0361:138b-17: gyi sgo nas kha dog rnam pa du ma dang
K10D0353_H0361:138b-19: shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med
K10D0353_H0361:138b-20: pa bye ba brgya stong 'das pa'i pha rol na
K10D0353_H0361:138b-21: / 'jig rten gyi khams bla ma mchog ces bya ba snang bar byas so //
K10D0353_H0361:138b-22: 'jig rten gyi khams de nas sangs rgyas dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba /
K10D0353_H0361:138b-25: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:138b-29: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /

K10D0353_H0361:138b-34: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang shin tu mnyam zhing gzhi bee d'u r+ya las byas pa /
K10D0353_H0361:138b-35: gser btso mas thig re 'ur bris pa /
K10D0353_H0361:139a-0: @139a *// rin po che sna bdun gyi shing bskyed pa /
K10D0353_H0361:139a-1: shing de dag kyang mda' rgyang gang tsam du mtho ba /
K10D0353_H0361:139a-6: rlung mi drag pas bskyod na sgra snyan pa 'byung ba /
K10D0353_H0361:139a-7: sgra de dag so so'i skye bos thos pas mi ngoms pa /
K10D0353_H0361:139a-8: skabs skabs na chu mig dang /
K10D0353_H0361:139a-10: khrus kyi rdzing bu yod la /
K10D0353_H0361:139a-11: yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba /
K10D0353_H0361:139a-12: rdzing gi zhabs kyang gser gyi bye mas bdal ba /
K10D0353_H0361:139a-13: rdzing gi ngos bzhin bsung dam pa dang ldan pa'i me tog padma dang /
K10D0353_H0361:139a-16: de ma yin pa'i me tog sngon po dang /
K10D0353_H0361:139a-19: dkar po shing rta'i phang lo tsam gyis chu'i steng yongs su khebs te /
K10D0353_H0361:139a-20: chu de'i nang na bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyang
K10D0353_H0361:139a-21: shin tu yed du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin
K10D0353_H0361:139a-22: to // rdzing de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru yod de /
K10D0353_H0361:139a-23: de na sems can mang po 'dod dgur rtse zhing longs spyod do //

K10D0353_H0361:139a-26: pa bshams nas rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan
K10D0353_H0361:139a-27: te / lha rdzas kyi na bza' khri'i steng du rim par bting ba /
K10D0353_H0361:139a-28: lha rdzas kyi spos kyi dri thul ba /
K10D0353_H0361:139a-29: lha rdzas kyi me tog gis chal bar bkram pa'i
K10D0353_H0361:139a-30: khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i rgyal
K10D0353_H0361:139b-0: po skyil mo krung du @139b bcas shing bzhugs pa
K10D0353_H0361:139b-1: la / byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa bye
K10D0353_H0361:139b-2: ba brgya stong snyed mdun du bdar te thal mo
K10D0353_H0361:139b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de la so so nas tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:139b-6: ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od bzang po kha dog sngon po dang /
K10D0353_H0361:139b-10: rab tu gsal ba dper mi bzod pa 'di nub
K10D0353_H0361:139b-11: phyogs logs nas 'khor mang po 'di dag la snang
K10D0353_H0361:139b-12: bar gyur te / gang la 'od kyi reg pa de dag thams cad lus dang /
K10D0353_H0361:139b-13: sems bde bar gyur pa de thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan du gsol /
K10D0353_H0361:139b-14: de la bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0353_H0361:139b-16: legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K10D0353_H0361:139b-17: khyod la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:139b-18: 'di nas nub phyogs yongs su 'jig rten gyi khams
K10D0353_H0361:139b-19: tshad med ba bye ba brgya stong 'das pa'i pha
K10D0353_H0361:139b-20: rol na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya
K10D0353_H0361:139b-21: ba yod de / de na sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba /
K10D0353_H0361:139b-24: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10D0353_H0361:139b-27: bde bar gshegs pa; 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K10D0353_H0361:139b-28: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10D0353_H0361:139b-31: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor nas /
K10D0353_H0361:140a-0: @140a *// 'khor mang po thams cad la thabs mkhas pa chen
K10D0353_H0361:140a-1: po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde ston cing sems
K10D0353_H0361:140a-2: can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:140a-3: bde ba'i don gyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi
K10D0353_H0361:140a-4: log par lta ba'i zug rdu rtsa nas gdon pa'i
K10D0353_H0361:140a-5: phyir / sems thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0353_H0361:140a-6: dag byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog cing
K10D0353_H0361:140a-9: rang sangs rgyas thams cad mthar phyin pa'i theg pa gcig gi lam la dgod pa'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:140a-10: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du mngon
K10D0353_H0361:140a-11: par byang chub cing sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i
K10D0353_H0361:140a-12: phyir / sems can thams cad kyi drin lci ba dran par bya ba'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:140a-13: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las dgrol ba'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:140a-14: so so'i skye bo mtha' dag pha ma dag la
K10D0353_H0361:140a-15: sri zhu bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'od 'di snang
K10D0353_H0361:140a-17: de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0353_H0361:140a-18: 'khor mang po'i ston pa dang gtso bor gyur pa
K10D0353_H0361:140a-19: / stong phrag bcu snyed stan las langs te /
K10D0353_H0361:140a-20: bla gos phyogs gcig tu byas nas /
K10D0353_H0361:140a-21: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te; bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:140a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag
K10D0353_H0361:140a-23: rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi
K10D0353_H0361:140b-0: zhing / de bzhin @140b gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la mchod pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:140b-2: thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi drin lan
K10D0353_H0361:140b-3: bsab pa'i mdo dam pa nyan cing mchi bar byin
K10D0353_H0361:140b-5: de nas sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0353_H0361:140b-7: khyed mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas /
K10D0353_H0361:140b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la mchod cing bkur sti bya ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:140b-9: shin tu phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:140b-11: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ni bskal pa grangs med
K10D0353_H0361:140b-12: pa bye ba khrag khrig gi bar du shin tu
K10D0353_H0361:140b-14: snying rje chen po'i smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo //
K10D0353_H0361:140b-15: gal te mngon par sangs rgyas pa ni /
K10D0353_H0361:140b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams sdig pa can ri dang /
K10D0353_H0361:140b-20: tsher ma la sogs pa yod pa'i gnas su sems can dag kyang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa /
K10D0353_H0361:140b-22: mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par spyod pa'i gnas der mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K10D0353_H0361:140b-24: bde ba'i don du sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su bcad de /
K10D0353_H0361:140b-25: bde ba thams cad dang yongs su ldan par byas nas /
K10D0353_H0361:140b-26: chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /
K10D0353_H0361:140b-27: lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam du btab bo //
K10D0353_H0361:141a-1: ldan 'das des thog mar de skad ces smon lam btab pas /
K10D0353_H0361:141a-2: khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas /

K10D0353_H0361:151a-15: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa /
K10D0353_H0361:151a-16: bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed kyi sems can gyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan to //
K10D0353_H0361:151a-17: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas de snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs mngon par bstan nas /
K10D0353_H0361:151a-19: phyogs bcu nas 'dus shing tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /

K10D0353_H0361:151a-25: chos la tshig tu bzod pa med mod kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:151b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas thabs @151b mkhas pa'i dbang gis mtshan ma dang /
K10D0353_H0361:151b-1: ming med pa'i chos la ming dang /
K10D0353_H0361:151b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa ni thog mar skyes shing 'khor

K10D0353_H0361:151b-6: phra rab snyed kyi lus kyi tshogs rnam pa tha
K10D0353_H0361:151b-7: dad pa de dag thams cad rdzogs par myong ste

K10D0353_H0361:151b-10: de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sems can gyi pha mar ma gyur pa med de /
K10D0353_H0361:151b-11: pha mar gyur pa thams cad kyi phyir rgyun du shin tu spyad dka' ba yang spyad /
K10D0353_H0361:151b-12: shin tu gtang dka' ba'i yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang /

K10D0353_H0361:151b-29: dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad gang yang ma btang ba med do //
K10D0353_H0361:151b-30: shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:151b-35: spyod pa dka' ba thams cad spyad de /
K10D0353_H0361:151b-37: ngal ba med cing rgyun mi 'chad par brtson 'grus
K10D0353_H0361:151b-38: su 'bad pa yang pha ma la sri zhu bya
K10D0353_H0361:152a-1: dang; drin lan bsab pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:152a-2: sems can thams cad myur du bla na med pa
K10D0353_H0361:152a-3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod pa
K10D0353_H0361:152a-4: dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:152a-5: de ltar na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas
K10D0353_H0361:152a-6: kyi bka' drin chen po yod par shes par bya
K10D0353_H0361:152a-7: ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:152a-8: rtag par shin tu thabs mkhas pas khams gsum pa'i
K10D0353_H0361:152a-9: srid pa nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas pa'i sems can
K10D0353_H0361:152a-10: thams cad la bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
K10D0353_H0361:152a-11: bar du mnyam snyoms pa'i byams pa bsgoms shing /
K10D0353_H0361:152a-12: btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i thabs mkhas pas spyod de /
K10D0353_H0361:152a-13: sems can thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:152a-15: phung po lnga stong pa nyid du rtogs shing phyir mi nur ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:152a-17: mi rgod pa stong pa nyid du yang dag pa'i
K10D0353_H0361:152a-18: mtshan nyid la thabs mkhas pas bsgom par bya ba
K10D0353_H0361:152a-19: dang / theg pa gsum mi spong zhing chub par
K10D0353_H0361:152a-20: slob pa'i thabs la mkhas pas shin tu zab mo'i
K10D0353_H0361:152a-21: spyod yul dam pa spyad pa la thabs mkhas bar
K10D0353_H0361:152a-22: dang / bya ba'i phyir / chos kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu gsal bar rtogs te /
K10D0353_H0361:152a-23: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thog ma dang /
K10D0353_H0361:152b-0: @152b tha ma'i bar du gcig ma yin par rtogs shing chud kyang /
K10D0353_H0361:152b-1: so so'i skye bo dag ni myos shing bslad pas /
K10D0353_H0361:152b-2: gdung ba gsum gyis yongs su gdungs te /
K10D0353_H0361:152b-3: sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor nub par gyur to //

K10D0353_H0361:152b-5: mi bden par kun tu rtog pas bdag med pa la bdag tu lta /
K10D0353_H0361:152b-6: mi rtag pa la rtag par lta /
K10D0353_H0361:152b-7: mi bde ba la bde bar lta /
K10D0353_H0361:152b-8: mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar lta zhing /
K10D0353_H0361:152b-13: skad cig tu mi rtag pas sgrib pa lnga dang; kun nas glag pa bcus kun tu glags te /
K10D0353_H0361:152b-14: srid pa gsum du 'khor zhing skye shi thog ma dang /
K10D0353_H0361:152b-15: tha ma med pa myong bar gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:152b-16: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ci dang /
K10D0353_H0361:152b-17: cir 'phrod pa bzhin sde snod gsum dang /
K10D0353_H0361:152b-18: mdo sde dgu nas mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi bar du rnam par phye zhing bstan to //
K10D0353_H0361:152b-19: so so'i 'dod pa bzhin mdo sde mang po gsungs so //
K10D0353_H0361:152b-20: tshig la chags pa kha cig bdag ni 'di kho nas chog ste /
K10D0353_H0361:152b-21: mya ngan las 'das pa thob ces 'dzin pa yang yod do //
K10D0353_H0361:152b-22: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi thugs rje
K10D0353_H0361:152b-23: chen po'i smon lam gyi shugs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig
K10D0353_H0361:152b-24: rten gyi khams na las mthun pa thams cad bsdus
K10D0353_H0361:152b-25: so // de ltar las mthun pa kun 'dus pa
K10D0353_H0361:152b-26: 'khor mang po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dam pa'i chos mdo
K10D0353_H0361:153a-0: so // sde gsungs @153a *// par dgongs te /
K10D0353_H0361:153a-1: gzugs brnyan gyi chos nam du yang rgyun mi 'chad cing /
K10D0353_H0361:153a-2: so so'i skye bo thams cad bde ba chen po thob par mdzad do //
K10D0353_H0361:153a-3: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'dul zhing ston pa yang dus las mi yol bar gshegs /
K10D0353_H0361:153a-4: dus las mi yol bar mya ngan las 'da'o //
K10D0353_H0361:153a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams kha cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba /
K10D0353_H0361:153a-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10D0353_H0361:153a-12: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10D0353_H0361:153a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes grags so //
K10D0353_H0361:153a-16: skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas su gshegs nas lha rnams kyi ston pa mdzad do //
K10D0353_H0361:153a-17: skabs kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gnas nas babs te /
K10D0353_H0361:153a-18: 'dzam bu'i gling du sku tshe lo brgyad cur bzhugs par yang ston to //
K10D0353_H0361:153a-19: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10D0353_H0361:153a-20: 'jig rten gyi khams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10D0353_H0361:153a-21: las kyi rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10D0353_H0361:153a-22: sems can gyi bsam pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo /
K10D0353_H0361:153a-23: bsam gtan gyi ting nge 'dzin yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10D0353_H0361:153a-24: klu'i mthu yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10D0353_H0361:153a-25: 'di ni sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
K10D0353_H0361:153b-0: sems can thams cad @153b kyis sangs rgyas kyi thugs la dgongs pa shes par 'dod na /
K10D0353_H0361:153b-1: sems can dbang po zhan pa tha ma'i bar du yang kun shes par mdzad do //
K10D0353_H0361:153b-2: sems can thams cad las gang yang sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod na /
K10D0353_H0361:153b-3: de ma thag tu mthong bar mdzad do //
K10D0353_H0361:153b-4: gal te mthong bar mi mdzad na /
K10D0353_H0361:153b-5: mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo //
K10D0353_H0361:153b-6: de bas na nyan thos dang /
K10D0353_H0361:153b-7: rang sangs rgyas dag lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa yod kyang mthong bar mi nus so //
K10D0353_H0361:153b-10: sangs rgyas kyis 'od zer chen po bskyed nas /
K10D0353_H0361:153b-11: srid pa'i rtse mo man chad mtshams med pa'i sems
K10D0353_H0361:153b-12: can dmyal ba yan chad snang bar mdzad kyang gang
K10D0353_H0361:153b-13: 'dul ba'i skal ba dang ldan pas ni mthong bar
K10D0353_H0361:153b-14: 'gyur / gang skal ba dang mi ldan pas ni mig sngar bab kyang mi mthong ngo //
K10D0353_H0361:153b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa skabs kha cig tu ni ched du skul ba mdzad /
K10D0353_H0361:153b-16: skabs cig tu ni cang mi gsung bas na /
K10D0353_H0361:153b-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
K10D0353_H0361:153b-18: shin tu dpag par dka' ba /
K10D0353_H0361:153b-19: shin tu shes shing rtogs par dka' na /
K10D0353_H0361:153b-20: ji ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la spyod
K10D0353_H0361:153b-21: pa dka' ba shin tu zab mo dri ba spobs
K10D0353_H0361:153b-22: par gyur / khyod kyis zhus pa 'di ni yang
K10D0353_H0361:153b-23: dag par sems can thams cad la byams shing snying
K10D0353_H0361:153b-25: ngan 'gro gsum gyi lam bkag nas /
K10D0353_H0361:153b-27: mi'i lam btod pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:154a-0: @154a *// ngas da khyod la pha ma la sri zhu bya
K10D0353_H0361:154a-1: ba'i spyad dka' ba mdo tsam zhig bstan par bya
K10D0353_H0361:154a-2: yi / legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig /
K10D0353_H0361:154a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang /
K10D0353_H0361:154a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K10D0353_H0361:154a-5: 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0353_H0361:154a-6: sngon byung ba bskal ba tshad med pa mtha' yas grangs med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na /
K10D0353_H0361:154a-7: yul w'a ra n'a sir sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa /
K10D0353_H0361:154a-9: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10D0353_H0361:154a-14: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10D0353_H0361:154a-19: mi'i ston pa 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K10D0353_H0361:154a-20: sangs rgyas de'i sku tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur bzhugs so //
K10D0353_H0361:154a-21: dam pa'i chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur gnas so //
K10D0353_H0361:154a-22: gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyang bskal pa chung ngu nyi shur gnas so //
K10D0353_H0361:154a-23: gzugs brnyan gyi chos la spyod pa'i tshe /
K10D0353_H0361:154a-24: mi'i rgyal po r'a dza zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10D0353_H0361:154a-25: yul w'a ra n'a si la dbang sgyur ro //
K10D0353_H0361:154a-26: rgyal po de la btsun mo ni nyi khri yod /
K10D0353_H0361:154a-27: blon po ni bzhi stong snyed yod do //
K10D0353_H0361:154a-28: bal gyi glang po che yang lnga brgya yod /
K10D0353_H0361:154b-0: rgyal @154b phran drug cu la dbang /
K10D0353_H0361:154b-1: grong khyer brgyad brgya zhig yod /
K10D0353_H0361:154b-2: rgyal po de la bu gsum yod de /
K10D0353_H0361:154b-3: gsum char yang rgyal phran re re byed do //
K10D0353_H0361:154b-4: de'i tshe de'i dus na yul w'a ra n'a si'i
K10D0353_H0361:154b-5: rgyal po de mkhas shing shes rab dang ldan te
K10D0353_H0361:154b-6: / rtag tu yang drang ba'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin pas /
K10D0353_H0361:154b-7: gang yang gtams las chad ces bya ba med do //
K10D0353_H0361:154b-9: yon tan gyi mthus char chu dus las mi yol te /
K10D0353_H0361:154b-10: lo tog rgyun du legs pas de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang bde skyid do //
K10D0353_H0361:154b-11: de'i tshe na w'a ra n'a si'i rgyal po de
K10D0353_H0361:154b-12: la blon po nag po sgra gcan zhes bya ba
K10D0353_H0361:154b-13: zhig yod do // blon po sgra gcan rgyal po la 'khus nas /
K10D0353_H0361:154b-14: dmag rnam bzhi bshams pa la /
K10D0353_H0361:154b-19: dpung bu chung gi tshogs bshams nas /
K10D0353_H0361:154b-20: w'a ra n'a si'i rgyal po la brgal nas rgyal po'i srog bcad do //
K10D0353_H0361:154b-21: de ltar rgyal po bsad nas kyang dmag gi tshogs rnam pa bzhi bkye nas /
K10D0353_H0361:154b-22: mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu rab kyang bsad do //
K10D0353_H0361:154b-23: de nas rgyal bu 'bring po yang phab nas /
K10D0353_H0361:154b-24: mtha'i rgyal phran rgyal bu tha chung gi thog tu dmag drang bar bshams so //
K10D0353_H0361:154b-25: rgyal bu tha chung de ngo mtshar du gzugs byad
K10D0353_H0361:154b-26: bzang la 'phags par mdzes shing rang bzhin gyis dge
K10D0353_H0361:155a-0: smra'o cog kyang phan pa'i don tu smra zhing @155a *//
K10D0353_H0361:155a-2: rtag tu drang po'i chos kyis yul gyi srid 'dzin te /
K10D0353_H0361:155a-3: log pas mi 'tsho bas yul mi rnams kyang bde skyid la dar ba /
K10D0353_H0361:155a-4: longs spyod dang nor ni rin po cher ldan pa /
K10D0353_H0361:155a-6: rgyal po de'i yon tan la kun gyis bsngags shing bstod pa /
K10D0353_H0361:155a-8: 'jig rten gyi lha thams cad kyis kyang dga' zhing bkur ba /
K10D0353_H0361:155a-9: de'i tshe na rgyal po de la rgyal bu su
K10D0353_H0361:155a-10: sha de ba zhes bya ba gcig pu zhig yod
K10D0353_H0361:155a-11: de / shin tu yid gzhungs shing gsal ba /
K10D0353_H0361:155a-12: byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa; sbyin pa la dga' ba /
K10D0353_H0361:155a-13: lus kyi mdog gser du 'dug pa /
K10D0353_H0361:155a-14: gnas bdun mnyam par gang ba /
K10D0353_H0361:155a-15: skyes bu'i mtshan rdzogs par ldan pa /
K10D0353_H0361:155a-16: lo bdun lon pa zhig yod pa de la yab
K10D0353_H0361:155a-17: rgyal po yang shin tu byams shing sdug par sems
K10D0353_H0361:155a-18: so // de'i tshe na pho brang srung ba'i lha
K10D0353_H0361:155a-19: zhig rgyal po de la 'di skad ces smras so
K10D0353_H0361:155a-22: blon po sgra gcan 'khus nas yul srid phrogs te /
K10D0353_H0361:155a-24: dmag gi tshogs bzhi yang bkye nas /
K10D0353_H0361:155a-25: rgyal po gcen gnyis kyang srog gi dbang po dang phral te /
K10D0353_H0361:155a-26: dmag gi tshogs rnams ring po mi thogs par 'dir phyin na /
K10D0353_H0361:155a-27: rgyal po ci'i phyir srog bskyabs shing gud du mi 'gro /
K10D0353_H0361:155a-28: de'i tshe na rgyal po des de skad ces smras pa thos nas /
K10D0353_H0361:155b-0: lus kyi @155b ba spu kun zing zhes byed de /
K10D0353_H0361:155b-1: lus kyang 'dar nas yi mug cing mya ngan gyis sems gdungs te /
K10D0353_H0361:155b-2: sa la 'gre zhing brgyal bar gyur nas ring zhig lon pa dang cung zad sangs te /
K10D0353_H0361:155b-3: dal gyis nam mkha'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:155b-4: 'di ltar smra ba'i skad ni yod la gzugs ni mi snang ba khyod ci yin /
K10D0353_H0361:155b-5: smras pa'i tshig 'di yang dag par bden nam /
K10D0353_H0361:155b-7: bdag ni rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba'i lha yin te /
K10D0353_H0361:155b-8: rgyal po khyod shes pa dang ldan zhing bsod nams
K10D0353_H0361:155b-9: dang yon tan bcas pas drang po'i chos kyi yul
K10D0353_H0361:155b-10: srid 'dzin te / de bas na bdag gis sngar smras pa yin te /
K10D0353_H0361:155b-11: sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs par ma gyur par myur du byol zhing 'gro ba'i rigs so //
K10D0353_H0361:155b-12: de nas rgyal po de pho brang du zhugs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:155b-13: da ni bdag yul gzhan zhig tu 'gro dgos so snyam du bsams so //
K10D0353_H0361:155b-15: yul pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam gnyis yod do //
K10D0353_H0361:155b-16: lam nye bar zhugs na ni zhag bdun gyis pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur /
K10D0353_H0361:155b-17: lam ring por zhugs na ni zhag bcu bzhis phyin par 'gyur bas /
K10D0353_H0361:155b-18: ci nas lam nye bar 'gro'o snyam bsams nas /
K10D0353_H0361:155b-19: zhag bdun gyi rgyags dang chas te pho brang gi phyi rol tu phyin pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:155b-20: phyir pho brang gi nang du log nas /
K10D0353_H0361:155b-21: rgyal bu su sha de ba pang du blangs te /
K10D0353_H0361:155b-22: mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing dngangs pa ltar langs nas phyir yang 'dug go /
K10D0353_H0361:156a-1: btsun mos de ltar mi bde zhing skrag pa ltar gyur pa mthong nas /
K10D0353_H0361:156a-2: rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:156a-4: ci'i slad du 'jigs shing skrag pa lta bu'i gzugs
K10D0353_H0361:156a-5: ston cing sku la yang rdul gyis gos pa lta
K10D0353_H0361:156a-7: dbugs kyang mi bde ste yul stor la thug pa'am /
K10D0353_H0361:156a-8: mdza' sdug pa dang bye ba'am /
K10D0353_H0361:156a-9: dgra sdang ba dang phrad pa lta bu dang /
K10D0353_H0361:156a-10: bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan ma dag gda' ba 'di ci lags bstan du gsol /
K10D0353_H0361:156a-12: kho bo ci nyes pa khyod kyis shes pa ma yin gyi /
K10D0353_H0361:156a-16: rgyal por lus gzugs gnyis kyang sems gcig ste /
K10D0353_H0361:156a-19: lus kyi rkang pa gnyis sam /
K10D0353_H0361:156a-21: de dang 'dra na ci'i slad du bdag la gsang ste mi gsung /
K10D0353_H0361:156a-22: rgyal pos btsun mo la smras pa /
K10D0353_H0361:156a-24: blon po sgra gcan ngan sems skyes nas /
K10D0353_H0361:156a-26: yab rgyal po yang dkrongs te /
K10D0353_H0361:156a-27: gcen rgyal bu gnyis kyi srog gi bar chad byas nas /

K10D0353_H0361:172a-17: la la ni gnyen bshes kyi sha yin no zhes
K10D0353_H0361:172a-18: ltogs pa de dag gis so so nas khyim bdag
K10D0353_H0361:172a-19: la drang po'i gtam byas nas /
K10D0353_H0361:172a-20: bdag cag ni shin tu ltogs pas gcig la gcig nying sha za bar gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:172a-21: de'i tshe sbyin bdag des dbugs kyis brnangs pa tsam
K10D0353_H0361:172a-22: du mi ltogs pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras
K10D0353_H0361:172a-23: so // khyed rnams deng phyin chad gcig la gcig nying sha za bar ma byed cig /
K10D0353_H0361:172a-24: khyed rnams la dgos pa'i yo byad gang yang rung /
K10D0353_H0361:172a-29: yo byad ci dgos pa thams cad sbyin par bya ste /
K10D0353_H0361:172b-0: zhag bdun na khyed rnams @172b kho bo'i sgor shog cig dang /
K10D0353_H0361:172b-4: ci 'dod pa tshim par bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:172b-5: de dag rab tu dga' rangs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:172b-8: ngo mtshar che'o zhes bstod pa byas so //
K10D0353_H0361:172b-9: de nas sbyin bdag de phyir khyim du 'ongs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:172b-13: las byed pa'i mi rnams kyang bsdus te /
K10D0353_H0361:172b-15: 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig snyan pas bu smad dang /
K10D0353_H0361:172b-17: las byed pa'i mi rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o //
K10D0353_H0361:172b-18: khyed rnams shes par gyis shig /
K10D0353_H0361:172b-19: kho bos smras pa'i tshig legs par nyon cig /
K10D0353_H0361:172b-21: than pa chen pos mu ge byung nas /
K10D0353_H0361:172b-22: mi thams cad ltogs te grangs med pa zhig shi bar gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:172b-23: bdag gi khyim na bang mdzod kun gang zhing lud de /
K10D0353_H0361:172b-24: 'bru yang grangs med pa zhig yod pas dus las ma yol bar bdag cag bsod nams bya'o zhes /
K10D0353_H0361:172b-25: bu smad kun gyis de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas /
K10D0353_H0361:172b-28: bdag cag gi srog lus sbyin pa byas kyang mi 'phangs na /
K10D0353_H0361:172b-31: kha zas lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10D0353_H0361:172b-32: de nas sbyin bdag kyang rab tu dga' rangs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-0: khyed rnams ni yang dag par kho bo'i bla na med pa'i byang chub thob @173a *//
K10D0353_H0361:173a-1: par byed pa'i grogs yin pa lta dge'o //
K10D0353_H0361:173a-3: khyed rnams kyang so so nas ci dang /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-4: ci bya ba rnams ci dang /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-5: ci bsgrub pa skol bya ba'i rigs pa yang mod la bya /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-6: bsgrub pa'i rigs pa yang myur du bsgrub ste /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-7: da ste zhag bdun na nges par 'byor bar bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:173a-8: de'i tshe sbyin bdag des so sor bsgo nas /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-9: khyim gyi phyi rol tu byung ste /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-10: gang nas mnyam zhing yang la bde ba'i gnas shig bltas nas /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-11: mod las gzhi dag par nyal nyil sa rdo med par byas /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-12: phyags te khri stan bshams so //
K10D0353_H0361:173a-13: de ltar mang po'i 'du ba'i gnas sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sa gzhi bshams nas /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-14: ban glang lnga brgya la kha zas bkal te /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-16: kha zas ni ri bzhin du spungs /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-17: zho chu ni mtsho bzhin du bskyil /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-20: khur ba la sogs pa kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa cho mcho dgu sbyar te /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-21: de ma yin pa; gzhan yang /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-25: lus kyi rgyan sna tshogs pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-28: rin po che sna bdun la sogs te thams cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar nas /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-29: zhag bdun lon pa'i skya rengs shar nas /
K10D0353_H0361:173a-30: zhag bdun gyi nyi ma dril rnga brdungs /
K10D0353_H0361:173b-0: skad chen pos thams cad sbyin pa'i @173b gnas 'dir 'dus shig ces bos so //
K10D0353_H0361:173b-1: de'i tshe na thams cad kyis bos pa'i skad thos nas /
K10D0353_H0361:173b-2: 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa tsam du rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te /
K10D0353_H0361:173b-3: thams cad sbyin pa gtong ba'i gnas su lhags te /
K10D0353_H0361:173b-7: lus kyi rgyan sna tshogs pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:173b-8: nad kyi rtsi sman mang po dang /
K10D0353_H0361:173b-11: rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa ci dang /
K10D0353_H0361:173b-12: ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du drangs nas sbyin pa'i
K10D0353_H0361:173b-13: rdzas ci yod pa thams cad kyis ma lus par
K10D0353_H0361:173b-14: khyer ro // de nas sbyin bdag de dga' nas phyir khyim du 'ongs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:173b-16: bu rnams dga' ba bzhin du 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod do //
K10D0353_H0361:173b-17: de nas kyang zhag bdun tsam lon pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:173b-19: sbyin bdag des sngar gos dang /
K10D0353_H0361:173b-21: skom la sogs pa'i sbyin pa byas na /
K10D0353_H0361:173b-22: kha zas zos pa rnams dug langs nas thams cad shi'o zhes zer ro //
K10D0353_H0361:173b-23: de ltar shi bar gyur bas thams cad kyis tshig tu brjod de /
K10D0353_H0361:173b-26: de ltar sbyin bdag chen po des kun la snying
K10D0353_H0361:173b-27: brtse ba'i phyir ci 'dod pa bzhin du kha zas
K10D0353_H0361:173b-28: la sogs pas tshim par byas te /
K10D0353_H0361:173b-31: phyis zhag mang po ma lon par dug langs nas thams cad shi'o par sgra sgrogs par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:174a-1: bdag chen po des de ltar gyur pa de thos nas yi mug cing mi dga' bar gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:174a-3: bu la sogs pa la khyed kyis kha zas ji ltar sbyar na /
K10D0353_H0361:174a-4: kha zas kyi nang du dug ma rungs pa ji ltar 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:174a-8: las byed pa'i mi rnams kyi mchid nas dug mi srid /
K10D0353_H0361:174a-9: dug 'di ga las 'ongs zhib tu rtogs shig ces smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:174a-10: de nas sbyin bdag de khyim gyi zhal te byed cing mthar gyis song song ba las /
K10D0353_H0361:174a-11: khron pa zhig steng bkab cing g-yogs pa mthong ngo //
K10D0353_H0361:174a-12: khron pa 'di ci'i phyir g-yogs zhes dris pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:174a-13: khron pa 'di ni khyim bdag khyod bus pa chung ngu'i tshe na /
K10D0353_H0361:174a-14: sbrul gdug pa gsum zhig gso gso ba las /
K10D0353_H0361:174a-15: khron pa 'di brkos nas sbrul gdug pa gsum bcug go /
K10D0353_H0361:174a-16: khron pa 'di ni sbrul gdug pa 'dug pa'i khron pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:174a-17: chu yang gdug pas chu 'di yang 'thungs pas na ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0353_H0361:174a-18: sbyin bdag des tshig de dag thos nas /
K10D0353_H0361:174a-19: las byed pa dag la khyed da bar kha zas g-yo ba'i tshe /
K10D0353_H0361:174a-21: kha zas ma g-yos sam; las byed pas smras pa /
K10D0353_H0361:174a-22: kha zas mang du g-yos pas rings nas chu 'di
K10D0353_H0361:174a-23: yang bcus nas kha zas kyi g-yos byas so zhes
K10D0353_H0361:174a-24: bsgo'o // khyim bdag mi dga' ste /
K10D0353_H0361:174b-1: bdag ni gti mug can shes pa'i blo med pa yin pa 'dra ste /
K10D0353_H0361:174b-2: ci'i phyir sbrul gdug pa gso zhing khron pa gdug pa rko zhes 'gyod nas /
K10D0353_H0361:174b-5: sbrul gdug pa gsum gyi khron pa myur du thongs shig /
K10D0353_H0361:174b-6: sbrul gdug pa gsum yang kho bo bdag gis bsreg go zhes bsgo ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:174b-7: las byed pa'i mi rnams kyis de ma thag tu
K10D0353_H0361:174b-8: khron pa de yang bsub nas med par byas so
K10D0353_H0361:174b-9: // de nas sbyin bdag des sbrul gdug pa'i khron pa de med par byas nas /
K10D0353_H0361:174b-10: phyi rol tu 'chag tu song song ba las /
K10D0353_H0361:174b-11: sbyin bdag gi kha zas dug can gyis shi bar
K10D0353_H0361:174b-12: gyur ba las thams cad tshig mthun par sbyin bdag
K10D0353_H0361:174b-13: 'dis bdag cag la kha zas dug can byin nas
K10D0353_H0361:174b-14: / bdag cag sngar shi bar gyur pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:174b-15: bdag cag gis de ltar shes na /
K10D0353_H0361:174b-16: der ma song yang rung zhes 'gyod pa skyes so //
K10D0353_H0361:174b-17: de bzhin du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de yang dge ba bcus sems can btul te /
K10D0353_H0361:174b-19: mi'i mtho ris skye zhing 'dod pa lnga la 'dod dgur longs spyod mod kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:174b-23: 'chi ba las mi thar ba yang de dang 'dra'o //
K10D0353_H0361:174b-24: de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de de'i
K10D0353_H0361:174b-25: mod la bdag bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0353_H0361:174b-26: chos dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos bsgrubs
K10D0353_H0361:174b-27: te sems can rnams kyang de la klog pa dang
K10D0353_H0361:175a-4: skye shi'i 'khor ba yongs su spangs shing mya ngan
K10D0353_H0361:175a-5: las 'das pa thob par bya'o zhes dam bcas so;
K10D0353_H0361:175a-6: ;de'i tshe na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sangs
K10D0353_H0361:175a-7: rgyas kyi chos tshol ba'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:175a-8: 'dzam bu'i gling na sangs rgyas kyi chos sus shes zhes gnas kun tu bkar btags so //
K10D0353_H0361:175a-9: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos 'dod pa'i phyir
K10D0353_H0361:175a-10: gnas kun tu bkar btags kyang shes pa ma byung
K10D0353_H0361:175a-11: ngo // mtha' 'khob kyi yul chung ngu gcig tu phyin pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:175a-12: de na bram ze gcig cig sangs rgyas kyi chos shes so zhes zer ro //
K10D0353_H0361:175a-13: de nas bram ze de'i steng du pho nya btang nas /
K10D0353_H0361:175a-14: pho nya de bram ze ga la bder phyin nas /
K10D0353_H0361:175a-16: sangs rgyas kyi chos shes sam zhes dris na /
K10D0353_H0361:175a-18: de nas pho nyas bram ze'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas /
K10D0353_H0361:175a-20: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos spyan 'dren du btang gis /
K10D0353_H0361:175a-21: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de ga la ba der gshegs su gsol /
K10D0353_H0361:175a-22: de nas bram ze yang der 'ongs nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos rgyang ma nas bsu ste /
K10D0353_H0361:175a-23: rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bde bar byon tam /
K10D0353_H0361:175a-24: lam du nyon mongs par ma gyur tam /
K10D0353_H0361:175a-25: ngal bar ma gyur tam zhes gtam dris te /
K10D0353_H0361:175b-0: pho brang gi nang @175b du khrid nas pho brang gi dbus su rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag go /
K10D0353_H0361:175b-1: bram zes kyang gdan la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go /
K10D0353_H0361:175b-2: de'i tshe rgyal pos bram ze de bde bar 'dug nas /
K10D0353_H0361:175b-3: dgos pa'i yo byad rnams kun phul te sbyin pa byas nas /
K10D0353_H0361:175b-4: thal mo sbyar te bram ze de la /
K10D0353_H0361:175b-6: sangs rgyas kyi chos shes sam zhes dris pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:175b-8: bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos shes so zhes zer ro //
K10D0353_H0361:175b-9: de nas rgyal pos bram ze la /
K10D0353_H0361:175b-11: bdag la bstan cing bshad du gsol /
K10D0353_H0361:175b-14: rgyal po khyod ni shin tu glen no //
K10D0353_H0361:175b-15: kho bos sangs rgyas kyi chos bslabs pa na /
K10D0353_H0361:175b-16: yun ring du dka' ba'i sdug bsngal myong nas gdod lobs pa yin na /
K10D0353_H0361:175b-17: nga rgyal pos thal phyung du thos par 'dod dam /
K10D0353_H0361:175b-22: bdag la mchod pa phul cig /
K10D0353_H0361:175b-34: bdag de 'dra ba'i mchod pa mi 'dod do //
K10D0353_H0361:175b-36: mchod pa de dag mi 'dod na /
K10D0353_H0361:176a-8: bdag ni de dag gang yang mi 'dod do; ;gal te lus la rma stong phyung ste /
K10D0353_H0361:176a-9: rma'i nang du mar blugs la me mar snying po btsugs te /
K10D0353_H0361:176a-10: mar me stong 'bar bas mchod na /
K10D0353_H0361:176a-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan cing bshad par bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:176a-12: gal te de ltar mi nus na bdag langs te 'gro zhes smras nas /
K10D0353_H0361:176a-13: rgyal pos skad cig tsam lan ma smras kyi bar du khri las babs so //
K10D0353_H0361:176a-14: de nas rgyal pos pang du blangs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:176a-16: cung zad nyag bsring du gsol /
K10D0353_H0361:176a-17: bdag shes pa zhan zhing bsod nams chung bas cung
K10D0353_H0361:176a-18: zad bsams te mchod par bgyid do zhes smras so
K10D0353_H0361:176a-19: // de'i tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:176a-20: bdag gis lus 'di thog ma med pa'i dus nas
K10D0353_H0361:176a-21: shi ba grangs med par myong na yang chos kyi
K10D0353_H0361:176a-23: da yang bdag gi lus 'di yang mthar 'jig cing rul bar gyur pas phan pa med de /
K10D0353_H0361:176a-24: da ni dus la bab bo snyam bsams nas /
K10D0353_H0361:176a-25: ston pa bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:176a-27: bdag mchod pa 'dod pa bzhin bgyid do //
K10D0353_H0361:176a-28: de nas rgyal po pho brang du song nas /
K10D0353_H0361:176b-0: btsun mo rnams la da ni bdag cag bye 'bral lo zhes @176b smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:176b-1: btsun mo rnams de skad ces smras pa thos nas dngangs shing 'khyams te /
K10D0353_H0361:176b-3: rgyal po de ltar ci zhig mdzed snyam dgongs zhes gsol lo //
K10D0353_H0361:176b-5: bdag gi lus 'di la mar me stong zhig btsugs
K10D0353_H0361:176b-6: te ston pa bram ze la mchod pa bya snyam
K10D0353_H0361:176b-7: mo // btsun mo rnams kyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas /
K10D0353_H0361:176b-8: sa la 'gre zhing cho nges btab ste brgyal lo //
K10D0353_H0361:176b-9: ring zhig lon pa dang phyir dran pa rnyed do //
K10D0353_H0361:176b-11: 'jig rten na bdag gi lus las phangs pa med de /
K10D0353_H0361:176b-12: nyes te dogs nas gso ba'i rim gro cher byed
K10D0353_H0361:176b-13: na; ci'i phyir bdag gi lus la mtho 'tsham zhing
K10D0353_H0361:176b-14: gnod par bgyid / rgyal po ni mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa lags na /
K10D0353_H0361:176b-16: 'on te yi dvags kyis brlams sam /
K10D0353_H0361:176b-19: de lta bu gang yang ma yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:176b-20: 'o na ci'i phyir de lta bu'i gnod pa mdzad cing bram ze la mchod par dgongs /
K10D0353_H0361:176b-22: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod de /
K10D0353_H0361:176b-23: sems can thams cad kyi don byed par sems so //
K10D0353_H0361:176b-24: de ltar sems can thams cad la dgongs na /
K10D0353_H0361:176b-25: de ci'i phyir bdag cag rnams bkol bar gyur /
K10D0353_H0361:176b-27: 'jig rten na mdza' sdug thams cad mthar bye 'bral du 'gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:176b-28: de bas na bdag gis lus kyi mchod pa byas te /
K10D0353_H0361:177a-1: nag gi khang bar ye shes chen po'i sgron ma gzugs shing /
K10D0353_H0361:177a-2: skye shir 'khor ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa snang bar byas la /
K10D0353_H0361:177a-3: kun nas dkris pa'i nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa bcad de /
K10D0353_H0361:177a-4: 'khor ba'i skyon las bsgral nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas su dgod pa'i ched du bsam gyi /
K10D0353_H0361:177a-7: de'i tshe btsun mo rnams de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas /
K10D0353_H0361:177a-8: brnangs pa ltar cang mi smra zhing skad chen po
K10D0353_H0361:177a-9: byung ste ngu zhing rang rang gi skra 'bal lo
K10D0353_H0361:177a-10: // bdag cag la bsod nams med de /
K10D0353_H0361:177a-11: bkra mi shis pas gson por bdag cag la lha med par gyur ces smra'o //
K10D0353_H0361:177a-12: rgyal po de la rgyal bu lnga brgya yod de /
K10D0353_H0361:177a-13: thams cad kyang mnga' byad bzang zhing sdug pa /
K10D0353_H0361:177a-14: yid gzhungs shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa /
K10D0353_H0361:177a-15: mi'i mtshan dang rdzogs par ldan pa /
K10D0353_H0361:177a-16: rgyal po yang mig bzhin du phangs shing byams so //
K10D0353_H0361:177a-17: de'i tshe rgyal pos rgyal bu rnams la smras pa /
K10D0353_H0361:177a-18: kho bo da mchod pa'i las shig byed snyam na /
K10D0353_H0361:177a-20: srog nyam chung du dogs te khyed dang bral ba snyam /
K10D0353_H0361:177a-22: 'bangs rnams kyi tshis ni che rims kyis byos shig ces bsgo'o //
K10D0353_H0361:177a-23: rgyal bu rnams de skad bsgo ba de thos nas /
K10D0353_H0361:177b-0: rtsa rnams bcad pa tsam @177b du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs te /
K10D0353_H0361:177b-2: mi brnangs pa la skyug tu'ang med /
K10D0353_H0361:177b-3: mid du yang med pa bzhin du rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:177b-4: ci'i slad du bdag cag rnams spangs te skyabs su ma mchis par mdzad /
K10D0353_H0361:177b-5: la la ni rgyal po'i gnya' ba nas 'khyud /
K10D0353_H0361:177b-6: la la ni lag pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:177b-7: rkang pa nas bzung nas skad phyung zhing du /
K10D0353_H0361:177b-11: skyabs med par 'gyur zhes smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:177b-12: de nas rgyal pos rgyal bu rnams la spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:177b-13: 'jig rten na mdza' zhing sdug pa thams cad mthar bye 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o //
K10D0353_H0361:177b-14: de skad ces bsgo ba thos kyang yid la gcags
K10D0353_H0361:177b-15: te 'bral mi phod na bdag gis gsol ba gcig
K10D0353_H0361:177b-19: ston pa bram ze la mchod pa mdzad du gsol /
K10D0353_H0361:177b-22: khyed rnams ni da dung shed ma bye la /
K10D0353_H0361:177b-23: chung bas de 'dra ba'i mchod pa byed mi bzod kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:177b-24: kho bo ni ston pa lam ring po nas gnyer
K10D0353_H0361:177b-25: te mchod pa bya bar khas blangs pa'i yid dang

K10D0353_H0361:184b-11: te / dad pa'i sems skyes pas /
K10D0353_H0361:184b-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /
K10D0353_H0361:184b-13: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:184b-14: kha cig ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i
K10D0353_H0361:184b-15: don gyi dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang
K10D0353_H0361:184b-16: ma mthong / dgongs te gsungs pa'i chos ma thos
K10D0353_H0361:184b-17: kyang dam pa'i chos 'jig par 'gyur bar mthong na
K10D0353_H0361:184b-18: ma mthong / / de 'di snyam du bla na
K10D0353_H0361:184b-19: med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos sems can rnams kyi

K10D0353_H0361:184b-23: byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis yun ring du gnas shing mi nub par mdzad de /
K10D0353_H0361:184b-24: da bdag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed la /
K10D0353_H0361:185a-1: thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs pa'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:185a-2: bdag gi lus 'di sdug bsngal chen po myong yang

K10D0353_H0361:185a-5: bskyed pa dang / kha cig ni sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0353_H0361:185a-6: chos 'jig pa ma mthong yang dus ngan pa'i sems
K10D0353_H0361:185a-7: can rnams nyon mongs pa shin tu lci ba 'dod
K10D0353_H0361:185a-8: bskyed pa dang / chags dang / zhe sdang dang /

K10D0353_H0361:185a-19: de 'di snyam du shin tu dus ngan pas sems can 'di dag ni dge ba mi spyod de /
K10D0353_H0361:185a-20: de ltar dus ngan pas theg pa gnyis kyi sems kyang skyed mi nus na /
K10D0353_H0361:185a-21: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0353_H0361:185a-22: chub tu sems bskyed pa lta ci smos snyam sems
K10D0353_H0361:185a-23: nas / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o //
K10D0353_H0361:185a-24: de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sems can

K10D0353_H0361:185a-27: par byed do // de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i rgyal pos /

K10D0353_H0361:185b-1: byang chub sems dpa' drin lan shes pa ni /
K10D0353_H0361:185b-2: bdag byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o //
K10D0353_H0361:185b-3: byang chub sems dpa' drin lan bsab pa ni /
K10D0353_H0361:185b-4: sems can pha rol po byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug pa'o zhes bgyi na /

K10D0353_H0361:185b-6: che thog ma dngos po ci'i rgyus byang chub tu
K10D0353_H0361:185b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K10D0353_H0361:185b-15: aa ha ha'i sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:185b-16: aa la la'i sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:185b-17: aa tsa tsa'i sems can dmyal ba dang /

K10D0353_H0361:185b-19: zangs khol ba chen po'i sems can dmyal ba dang /

K10D0353_H0361:185b-21: rdo nag po chen po'i sems can dmyal ba nas /
K10D0353_H0361:185b-22: me'i shing rta'i dmyal ba'i bar du'o //

K10D0353_H0361:185b-26: dmyal ba'i srung ma aa bang ni shing rti'i steng na 'dug cing mig bgrad /
K10D0353_H0361:185b-27: so gcigs te me 'bud pa kha dang /
K10D0353_H0361:186a-2: srung ma de yang lus shin tu che zhing gnag la /

K10D0353_H0361:186a-4: lag pa na lcags kyi dbyug pa thogs te nga la rdeg go /
K10D0353_H0361:186a-5: de'i tshe ngan pa'i sdug bsngal ma bzod nas stobs ci nus kyis shing rta drangs so //

K10D0353_H0361:186a-8: rtse gsum pa thogs nas brang du btsugs te /

K10D0353_H0361:186a-12: pas na tsha ba'i skad chen po byung nas par
K10D0353_H0361:186a-14: bar 'ga' ni chung ma bu zhe bos kyang phan pa med do //
K10D0353_H0361:186a-15: nga de'i tshe na de lta bu'i sdug bsngal chen
K10D0353_H0361:186a-16: po myong ba mthong nas snying rje'i sems skyes so
K10D0353_H0361:186a-17: // de ltar snying rje'i sems chen po skyes pa'i
K10D0353_H0361:186a-18: rkyen gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to

K10D0353_H0361:186b-9: la la ni zhe sdang gi rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10D0353_H0361:186b-10: la la ni sbyin pa'i rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10D0353_H0361:186b-11: la la ni ser sna'i rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10D0353_H0361:186b-12: la la ni dga' ba'i rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10D0353_H0361:186b-13: la la ni mya ngan gyi rkyen gyis skye'o //

K10D0353_H0361:186b-15: gyis skye'o; ;la la ni dgra sdang ba dang phrad
K10D0353_H0361:186b-17: la la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa'i rkyen gyis skye'o //

K10D0353_H0361:186b-19: la la ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10D0353_H0361:186b-20: la la ni chos thos pa'i rkyen gyis skye'o //
K10D0353_H0361:186b-21: de bas na sems can rnams la byang chub tu

K10D0353_H0361:186b-24: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos /

K10D0353_H0361:187a-1: pa na skye bo khri brgya stong snyed kyis bla
K10D0353_H0361:187a-2: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
K10D0353_H0361:187a-3: tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:187a-4: 'khor mang po de dag las la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa nas /
K10D0353_H0361:187a-5: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:187a-10: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad nyan thos dang /
K10D0353_H0361:187a-11: rang sangs rgyas su sems bskyed par gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:187a-12: chos thos pa la rab tu dga' rangs nas mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10D0353_H0361:187a-13: g-yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas phyir dong ngo;
K10D0353_H0361:187a-14: ;thabs la mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan
K10D0353_H0361:187a-16: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////

K10D0353_H0361:187a-20: 'jam bu'i gling gi mi rnams zhag dgu bcu'i bar
K10D0353_H0361:187a-21: du de bzhin gshegs pa ga la bzhugs pa ma
K10D0353_H0361:187a-22: rtogs so // mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog tu gyur pas kyang /
K10D0353_H0361:187a-24: phyogs bcur brtags kyang ma rtogs so //
K10D0353_H0361:187a-25: 'phags pa nye bar skyong lta bu lha'i mig mchog
K10D0353_H0361:187a-26: gis phyogs bcur stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig

K10D0353_H0361:187b-1: to; ;de bzhin du 'phags pa'i 'khor lnga brgya'i bar
K10D0353_H0361:187b-2: du kun gyis brtags kyang ma mthong ngo //
K10D0353_H0361:187b-3: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong bas de dag mi dga' ste /
K10D0353_H0361:187b-4: mya ngan gyis sems gdungs par gyur to //

K10D0353_H0361:187b-6: gshegs pa ma mthong bas mi dga' ba'i sems skyes
K10D0353_H0361:187b-7: te / de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i phyir /

K10D0353_H0361:187b-9: mchod pa byed pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0353_H0361:187b-10: mngon sum dang 'dra bar bzhugs par dmigs nas mchod
K10D0353_H0361:187b-11: pa byas so // de'i tshe rgyal po chen pos mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug pos nas /
K10D0353_H0361:187b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar ga la bzhugs zhes dris na /
K10D0353_H0361:187b-13: ston pa drug gis rgyal po la 'di skad smras so //

K10D0353_H0361:187b-18: sgyu 'phrul gyi sgyu ma ni bden pa'i dngos po med pas /
K10D0353_H0361:187b-19: bdag cag gi gtsug lag las lo stong ngam /
K10D0353_H0361:187b-20: nyis stong na sgyu 'phrul can sgyu ma zhig 'byung ngo zhes 'chad pas /
K10D0353_H0361:187b-21: dge sbyong goo ta ma ni sgyu ma de kho na yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:187b-22: de'i tshe 'phags pa nye bar skyod rgyal po chen
K10D0353_H0361:187b-23: po ga la bar song nas rgyal po la 'di
K10D0353_H0361:187b-25: rgyal po chen po mkhyen tam /
K10D0353_H0361:188a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ste zhag bdun na sum cu rtsa gsum gnam nas @188a *//
K10D0353_H0361:188a-2: rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:188a-3: yul mi bsdus nas chag chag dang /
K10D0353_H0361:188a-11: rol mo la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs bshams shing sbyar ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:188a-12: mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug der 'ongs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:188a-13: khyed rnams 'di ltar mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs bshams shing sbyar ba 'di /
K10D0353_H0361:188a-16: de dag gis de ma yin no zhes smras pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:188a-17: 'o na blon po chen po 'bod dam /
K10D0353_H0361:188a-19: de ma yin na gnyen bshes kyi dus ston byed dam /
K10D0353_H0361:188a-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol lo //
K10D0353_H0361:188a-23: ston pa drug gis smras pa /

K10D0353_H0361:203b-9: // de nas btsun mo ri dvags mas sku gdung bsdus nas /
K10D0353_H0361:203b-10: rgyab kyi skyed mos tshal du mchod rten bzhi brgya
K10D0353_H0361:203b-11: dgu bcu rtsa dgu byas nas mchod pa byed do
K10D0353_H0361:203b-12: // rgyal bu nang gi chung ngu'ang zhag dgu bcu 'das nas /
K10D0353_H0361:203b-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob ste /
K10D0353_H0361:203b-15: yum la cho 'phrul chen po bstan to //
K10D0353_H0361:203b-16: cho 'phrul chen po bstan nas mya ngan las 'das so //
K10D0353_H0361:203b-17: de nas btsun mo ri dvags mas sku gdung bsdus nas mchod rten brtsigs te mchod pa byas so //
K10D0353_H0361:203b-18: de'i tshe na btsun mo ri dvags mas nyin gcig bzhin bdug spos dam pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:203b-20: rol mo sna tshogs kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya'i
K10D0353_H0361:203b-21: mchod rten la mchod pa byed cing mchod rten de
K10D0353_H0361:203b-22: dag gi drung na mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed
K10D0353_H0361:203b-24: bdag gis bu lnga brgya btsas nas rab tu byung
K10D0353_H0361:203b-25: mod kyi de la gcig tsam yang bla na med
K10D0353_H0361:204a-0: pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa med @204a *//
K10D0353_H0361:204a-1: pas 'di skad ces smon lam du btab bo //
K10D0353_H0361:204a-2: bdag gis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya mchod pa byas shing /
K10D0353_H0361:204a-3: mchod rten lnga brgya brtsigs te /
K10D0353_H0361:204a-4: sku gdung la mchod pa'i bsod nams ci yod pa sems can thams cad la bsngo'o //
K10D0353_H0361:204a-5: bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bu mang du btsas
K10D0353_H0361:204a-6: shing bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems mi
K10D0353_H0361:204a-8: bu gcig pu zhig btsas la bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K10D0353_H0361:204a-9: tshe de nyid la rab tu byung nas thams cad
K10D0353_H0361:204a-10: mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan par shog cig ces
K10D0353_H0361:204a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0353_H0361:204a-13: de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo ri dvags ma
K10D0353_H0361:204a-14: de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na de ltar
K10D0353_H0361:204a-15: mi lta ste / de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun
K10D0353_H0361:204a-16: mo ri dvags ma de nyid ni da ltar yum
K10D0353_H0361:204a-18: yum lha mdzes de ltar rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya la mchod pa byas te /
K10D0353_H0361:204a-19: dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med pa bskyed pas de
K10D0353_H0361:204a-20: bas na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bltams
K10D0353_H0361:204a-21: pa yin no // sangs rgyas kyis chos 'di bstan pa na /
K10D0353_H0361:204a-22: lha dang mi grangs med pa 'bras bu dang po thob pa nas /
K10D0353_H0361:204a-23: 'bras bu bzhi pa'i bar du thob par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:204a-24: sems can tshad med pa snyed ni /
K10D0353_H0361:204b-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @204b pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:204b-1: de nas kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:204b-2: yum lha mdzes sngon las ci zhig bgyis na /
K10D0353_H0361:204b-3: dud 'gro'i nang du dung 'gror btsas te rigs kyi bu mor gyur /
K10D0353_H0361:204b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0353_H0361:204b-6: yum lha mdzes sngon 'das pa'i dus na las ci byas pa'i rgyu dang /
K10D0353_H0361:204b-7: rkyen khyod la dgrol zhing bshad par bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:204b-8: sngon 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med tshad med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na /
K10D0353_H0361:204b-9: de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba /
K10D0353_H0361:204b-12: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10D0353_H0361:204b-17: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10D0353_H0361:204b-19: ston pa rgyal ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10D0353_H0361:204b-20: sems can gyi don mdzad nas /
K10D0353_H0361:204b-21: mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gzugs brnyan la chos spyod pa na /
K10D0353_H0361:204b-22: de'i tshe de'i dus na yul w'a ra n'a si
K10D0353_H0361:204b-23: zhes bya bar bram ze zhig la bu mo gcig
K10D0353_H0361:204b-24: pu zhig byung nas bram ze de tshe'i dus byas
K10D0353_H0361:204b-25: so // bram ze de'i chung ma des bu mo de gsos so //
K10D0353_H0361:204b-26: bu mo de yang bgas kyis cher skyes so //
K10D0353_H0361:204b-27: bu mo ma smad la bza' shing gi ra ba zhig yod de /
K10D0353_H0361:204b-28: mas bu mo ra ba srung du bcug go /
K10D0353_H0361:205a-0: bu mo bdag ni tshol zhing ci @205a *//
K10D0353_H0361:205a-1: snyed pa phyir 'ongs nas bu mo dang lhan cig za'o //
K10D0353_H0361:205a-2: rtag tu de bzhin du zas tshol ba las nyi ma gcig 'phyis nas dus las yol nas /
K10D0353_H0361:205a-4: skom pas gdungs pas khro sems skyes nas /
K10D0353_H0361:205a-5: bdag gi ma de rkyen ci byung na da tsam gyi bar du kha zas ma byin te /
K10D0353_H0361:205a-6: bdag 'di ltar bkres shing skom par byas zhes khros
K10D0353_H0361:205a-7: nas bdag gi ma dud 'gro tsam du yang mi
K10D0353_H0361:205a-8: phod de / dud 'gros gcan zan dang /
K10D0353_H0361:205a-10: bya yang bu la bkres skom dran te /
K10D0353_H0361:205a-11: dus bzhin du snyod du 'ong ngo zhes smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:205a-12: de skad ces smras pas; ring po ma lon par mas zas thogs te 'ongs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:205a-13: za ba'i 'phro las rang sangs rgyas dge sbyong gi
K10D0353_H0361:205a-14: gzugs can zhig lho phyogs nas byang phyogs su nam
K10D0353_H0361:205a-15: mkha' la 'gro ba de bu mo des mthong nas
K10D0353_H0361:205a-16: / dge slong de la dga' ba'i sems skyes te /
K10D0353_H0361:205a-17: 'dug pa las langs nas thal mo sbyar te mgo bos phyag btsal nas spyan drangs so //
K10D0353_H0361:205a-18: stan gtsang ma bting ste me tog bzang pos mchod nas /
K10D0353_H0361:205a-19: kha zas de las bgos nas dge slong de la phul lo //
K10D0353_H0361:205a-20: dge slong des zas kyi bya ba byas nas dam pa'i chos bstan nas spro ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:205a-22: de'i tshe bu mo des 'di skad ces smon lam du btab bo //
K10D0353_H0361:205a-23: bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'phags pa dang phrad cing /
K10D0353_H0361:205b-0: bdag byad @205b bzhin bzang zhing mdzes pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:205b-2: 'gro ba'i gom pa'i 'og nas padmo skyes te rkang
K10D0353_H0361:205b-3: pa 'degs par shog cig ces smon lam btab bo
K10D0353_H0361:205b-4: // bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0353_H0361:205b-5: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bu mo de ni btsun mo ri dvags ma yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:205b-6: de ltar rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms gcig phul te /
K10D0353_H0361:205b-7: me tog bzang pos mchod pas; tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du che zhing btsan la /
K10D0353_H0361:205b-9: zas yid bzhin du ldan te /
K10D0353_H0361:205b-10: rkang pa'i 'og nas padmo skyes so //
K10D0353_H0361:205b-11: smon lam gyi mthus da yang rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya dang phrad de mchod pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:205b-14: de'i tshe drin mi shes te tshig ngan pa gcig
K10D0353_H0361:205b-15: gis ma la dud 'gro dang 'dra'o zhes smras pa'i
K10D0353_H0361:205b-16: ngag gis las ngan pa'i rkyen gyis /
K10D0353_H0361:205b-17: tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du ri dvags kyi ltor skyes so //
K10D0353_H0361:205b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0353_H0361:205b-19: 'jig rten du skyes so cog gi nyes pa ni
K10D0353_H0361:205b-20: rang gi kha nas byung bas ngag gi las bsrung
K10D0353_H0361:205b-21: bar bya'o // ngag gi las ni me 'bar bas
K10D0353_H0361:205b-22: tshig pa bas lhag ste me 'bar bas tshig pa
K10D0353_H0361:205b-23: de ni tshe gcig par zad do //
K10D0353_H0361:205b-24: ngag gi las mi dge ba'i me 'bar bas ni skye ba grangs med par 'tshig go /
K10D0353_H0361:205b-25: me 'bar bas ni 'jig rten nor tsam 'tshig go /
K10D0353_H0361:206a-0: ngag mi dge ba'i me 'bar bas ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun 'tshig par 'gyur @206a *//
K10D0353_H0361:206a-3: sems can thams cad kyi nyes pa ni kha nas byung ste /
K10D0353_H0361:206a-5: lce ni lus gcod pa'i mtshon zhes kyang bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:206a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa na /
K10D0353_H0361:206a-7: dge bsnyen ma stong snyed dag gis ngag gi las
K10D0353_H0361:206a-8: bsrungs pas 'bras bu dang po thob par gyur to
K10D0353_H0361:206a-10: mi grangs med pa snyed ni bla na med pa
K10D0353_H0361:206a-11: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
K10D0353_H0361:206a-12: pa nas / rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:206a-13: 'khor mang po thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
K10D0353_H0361:206a-14: pa la mngon par rab tu dga' nas phyag byas
K10D0353_H0361:206a-17: kun dga' bo rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms blangs nas slar gshegs pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:206a-18: grong khyer gyi phyi rol na grog po zab mo gcig yod /
K10D0353_H0361:206a-19: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi mi rnams bshad gci dang /
K10D0353_H0361:206a-20: mi gtsang ba thams cad grog po der skyel lo //
K10D0353_H0361:206a-21: char ba bab na gru char gyi chu rnams kyang der 'bab bo //
K10D0353_H0361:206a-22: de'i tshe grog po'i chu btsog pa de'i nang na /
K10D0353_H0361:206a-23: srin bu mi'i gzugs 'dra ba la rkang lag mang
K10D0353_H0361:206a-24: ba zhig rgyang ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa byon
K10D0353_H0361:206a-25: pa mthong nas / chu'i nang nas mgo bteg nas /
K10D0353_H0361:206a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa la bltas nas mig nas mchi ma zag go /
K10D0353_H0361:206b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis de gzigs nas thugs rje bar @206b dgongs te mi dgyes par gyur nas /
K10D0353_H0361:206b-1: slar bya rgod spungs pa'i ri la gshegs so //
K10D0353_H0361:206b-2: de nas kun dga' bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan
K10D0353_H0361:206b-3: gding ba bting nas skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs
K10D0353_H0361:206b-4: so // de nas kun dga' bos 'khor thams cad la bltas te /
K10D0353_H0361:206b-5: 'khor gyi bsam pa sems kyis shes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:206b-7: da ci chab btsog pa'i nang na srin bu zhig mchis pa de /
K10D0353_H0361:206b-8: sngon las ci bgyis pas chab btsog pa de'i nang du skyes /
K10D0353_H0361:206b-9: der skyes nas ni ji srid cig lags /
K10D0353_H0361:206b-10: da yang nam zhig de las thar bar 'gyur /
K10D0353_H0361:206b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang /
K10D0353_H0361:206b-12: 'khor mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0353_H0361:206b-14: khyed la legs par dgrol bar bshad par bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:206b-16: sngon 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa stong 'das pa'i sngon rol na /
K10D0353_H0361:206b-17: de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:206b-18: sems can gyi don mdzad de /
K10D0353_H0361:206b-19: yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K10D0353_H0361:206b-20: mya ngan las 'das nas gzugs brnyan la chos spyod pa na /
K10D0353_H0361:206b-21: bram ze zhig gis dge 'dun gyi gnas khang byas te /
K10D0353_H0361:206b-23: de'i tshe na yon bdag zhig gis dge 'dun la mar dang; 'bru mar dag phul te /
K10D0353_H0361:206b-24: de na dge slong 'dron po dag cig kyang lhags so //
K10D0353_H0361:206b-25: de'i tshe gang zag gi las gtsang sbyor byed pa zhig dge slong 'dron po 'ongs pa mthong nas /
K10D0353_H0361:207a-1: mar bcabs shing bsregs nas dge 'dun 'dron po la ma byin no //
K10D0353_H0361:207a-2: dge 'dun 'dron pos gtsang sbyor la mar dang /
K10D0353_H0361:207a-4: sbrang rtsi 'ongs pa nged la mi sbyin nam zhes dris pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:207a-5: gtsang sbyor gyis khyed ni 'dron po /
K10D0353_H0361:207a-6: nged ni gza' yin no zhes smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:207a-8: yon bdag gis mngon sum gyi dge 'dun la phul ba ma yin nam zhes smras pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:207a-9: de'i tshe na gtsang sbyor gyi las byed pa de khros shing 'jigs su rung ba zhig pas /
K10D0353_H0361:207a-10: dge slong 'dron po la khyed bshang gci mi za bar nga la mar dang /
K10D0353_H0361:207a-11: 'bru mar 'dod dam zhes tshig ngan pa smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:207a-12: de ltar tshig ngan pa smras pa'i las kyis bskal
K10D0353_H0361:207a-13: pa bye ba dgu bcu'i bar du rgyun du chu
K10D0353_H0361:207a-14: btsog pa 'dir skyes par gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:207a-15: de'i tshe de'i dus na gtsang sbyor gyi las byed pa de ni /
K10D0353_H0361:207a-16: de ci chu btsog pa'i nang na 'dug pa'i srin bu de yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:207a-18: tshig ngan pa gcig dge 'dun la smras pas /
K10D0353_H0361:207a-19: tshe rabs bgrangs pa brgya stong gi bar du gnas btsog pa der skyes so //
K10D0353_H0361:207a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis nye gnas rnams bka' stsal pa /
K10D0353_H0361:207a-21: khyed rnams ngag gi las sdom zhing srungs shig /
K10D0353_H0361:207a-22: ngag gi nyes pa ni me 'bar ba las lhag go /
K10D0353_H0361:207a-24: dge 'dun ni bsngags shing bstod par 'os pas tshig
K10D0353_H0361:207b-0: 'jam por smra zhing rgyun @207b du drin dran par
K10D0353_H0361:207b-1: bya'o // dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni khams gsum
K10D0353_H0361:207b-2: las 'da' bar byed pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing ngo
K10D0353_H0361:207b-3: bya'o // // pha ma ni khams gsum gyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog dam pa'o //
K10D0353_H0361:207b-5: dge 'dun gyi nang na skyes bu zung bzhi ya brgyad dang /
K10D0353_H0361:207b-7: rim gro byas na bsod nams 'thob la bsgrubs na byang chub 'grub bo //
K10D0353_H0361:207b-8: pha ma ni zla ba bcu'i bar du ltor bzhag la byung nas kyang gsher ni bor /
K10D0353_H0361:207b-10: nu zho bsnun nas cher bskyed do //
K10D0353_H0361:207b-11: skyes nas yang rig byed mkhas pas slob cing dus las mi yol bar rim gro byed do //
K10D0353_H0361:207b-12: gal te rab tu byung na bsod nams byed pas skye shi'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal te /
K10D0353_H0361:207b-14: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:207b-19: dge 'dun ni sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing gnyis zhes bya ste /
K10D0353_H0361:207b-21: mi gnyis de rnams kyi rkyen gyis mya ngan las
K10D0353_H0361:207b-22: 'das pa rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu dam pa
K10D0353_H0361:207b-23: thob pa nas / sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K10D0353_H0361:207b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:207b-26: mi ma yin pa sems can tshad med pa brgya
K10D0353_H0361:207b-27: stong snyed 'bras bu dang po nas 'bras bu bzhi
K10D0353_H0361:207b-28: pa'i bar du thob par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:207b-29: la la ni bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems /
K10D0353_H0361:208a-1: la la ni nyan thos dang /
K10D0353_H0361:208a-2: rang sangs rgyas su sems bskyed do //
K10D0353_H0361:208a-3: so so nas thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas la
K10D0353_H0361:208a-4: phyag btsal nas bskor ba byas te; rab tu dga'
K10D0353_H0361:208a-7: yul w'a ra n'a si na blon po bram ze
K10D0353_H0361:208a-8: rab tu phyug pa nor rin po che mang ba
K10D0353_H0361:208a-12: man shel dang; byu ru dang /
K10D0353_H0361:208a-14: bal gyi glang po che dang /
K10D0353_H0361:208a-20: las byed pa'i mi mang du yod pa zhig la /
K10D0353_H0361:208a-21: lo brgyad cu lon nas khye'u zhig byung ngo //
K10D0353_H0361:208a-22: khye'u de yang byad bzhin bzang la sdug pa mdzes pa /
K10D0353_H0361:208a-23: mi'i mtshan rdzogs par ldan pas pha ma gnyis rab tu dga' nas /
K10D0353_H0361:208a-24: mtshan mkhan pos te mtshan bltas so //
K10D0353_H0361:208a-25: mtshan mkhan gyis mtshan bltas nas /
K10D0353_H0361:208a-26: khye'u de'i ming yang tsun da zhes btags nas /
K10D0353_H0361:208a-28: lo bdun lon nas pha ma gnyis byams ches pas rab tu byung bar gnang ngo //
K10D0353_H0361:208a-29: rab tu byung ba'i phyir dbang phyug gi ri zhes
K10D0353_H0361:208a-30: bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bzhugs par
K10D0353_H0361:208a-31: khrid do // de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khor rnam bzhi dang /
K10D0353_H0361:208a-35: de la sogs pa la mdun gyis byas te 'khor
K10D0353_H0361:208a-36: mang po 'jig rten gyi rig byed kyi gtsug lag
K10D0353_H0361:208b-0: dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i @208b chos ston to //
K10D0353_H0361:208b-1: de nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:208b-3: bdag rgas 'khogs nas khye'u zhig gi mchis pa /
K10D0353_H0361:208b-5: thugs rje chen pos bskyab cing bdag gi bu 'di
K10D0353_H0361:208b-6: nye gnas su bzhes su gsol lo zhes smras so
K10D0353_H0361:208b-7: // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 'ongs so //
K10D0353_H0361:208b-8: zhes bka' stsal nas skra yang rang byi nas chos gos lus la rang yod par gyur nas /
K10D0353_H0361:208b-12: lam gyi 'bras bu yang thob ste /
K10D0353_H0361:208b-13: rig pa gsum dang; mngon par shes pa drug dang /
K10D0353_H0361:208b-14: rnam par grol ba brgyad dang ldan par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:208b-15: de'i tshe kun dga' bos 'khor mang po la bltas te /
K10D0353_H0361:208b-16: kun gyi the tshom dgrol ba'i phyir stan las langs
K10D0353_H0361:208b-17: te gos tshags bcos nas bla gos phyogs gcig tu

K10D0353_H0361:209b-1: zhes smras so // de nas dge slong rgan po des dge slong gzhon nu la /

K10D0353_H0361:209b-20: dge slong rgan po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas /

K10D0353_H0361:209b-27: zag pa zad par shog cig ces bshags shing mthol lo //

K10D0353_H0361:210a-2: de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong gzhon nu mdzod
K10D0353_H0361:210a-3: gsum dang ldan pa de tshig brlang po gcig gis
K10D0353_H0361:210a-4: / dge slong rgan po la smras pas //
K10D0353_H0361:210a-5: tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du khyi'i lus myong bar gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:210a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs nas /

K10D0353_H0361:210a-12: lcags kyi 'khor lo tsha ba dag /
K10D0353_H0361:210a-13: spyi bo'i steng na rgyun 'khor yang //
K10D0353_H0361:210a-14: sdug bsngal bar ni mi 'dzin te //
K10D0353_H0361:210a-15: nam du'ang tshig ngan mi smra'o //
K10D0353_H0361:210a-16: lcags kyi 'khor lo tsha ba dag /
K10D0353_H0361:210a-17: spyi bo'i thog na rgyun 'khor yang //
K10D0353_H0361:210a-18: sdug bsngal bar ni mi 'dzin te //

K10D0353_H0361:210a-21: sh'a ri'i bu ni sems can mang po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pas /
K10D0353_H0361:210a-22: nyin mtshan dus drug tu lha'i mig gis 'gro ba lnga'i skye bo rnams la rtog cing lta ste /
K10D0353_H0361:210a-23: 'dul ba'i dus la bab na de'i don byed do //

K10D0353_H0361:210a-26: tshong pa lnga brgya zhig rtag tu phan tshun rgyu ba las /
K10D0353_H0361:210a-27: phan tshun du rgyu ba'i lam de yang 'jigs pa che bas /
K10D0353_H0361:210b-0: tshong pa gcig @210b la khyi dkar po gcig yod de /
K10D0353_H0361:210b-1: de'i tshe tshong pa gcig srod la sha btsos nas bzhag pa las /
K10D0353_H0361:210b-2: nam gyi cha smad la khyi des brkus nas zas so //
K10D0353_H0361:210b-3: phyi de nyin nam nangs nas tshong pa grogs pos sha bza' bar byas pa las /
K10D0353_H0361:210b-4: ma rnyed pas gdungs nas khros te mtshon thogs te
K10D0353_H0361:210b-5: khyi de'i rkang lag bzhi bcad de su ra khung
K10D0353_H0361:210b-7: su ra khung na khyi de sdug bsngal chen po myong ba de /
K10D0353_H0361:210b-8: sha ri'i bus nam gyi cha stod la lha'i mig
K10D0353_H0361:210b-9: gis kun tu brtags nas rgyang ma nas khyi sdug
K10D0353_H0361:210b-11: de nas phyi de nyin par nam langs nas chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te /
K10D0353_H0361:210b-12: grong khyer nas bsod snyoms blangs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:210b-13: gang na 'jigs pa'i lam su ra khung du phyin nas /
K10D0353_H0361:210b-14: bsod snyoms bslangs pa khyi de la bsnyod do //
K10D0353_H0361:210b-17: khyi des thos nas ngo tsha zhing mi dga' ste /
K10D0353_H0361:210b-18: de nas zhag bdun lon nas /
K10D0353_H0361:210b-19: sdig pa'i las bor nas thar te /
K10D0353_H0361:210b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /

K10D0353_H0361:211a-0: bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge ba'i gnyen @211a *//
K10D0353_H0361:211a-1: dang phrad par shog cig par smon lam btab bo //
K10D0353_H0361:211a-2: de ltar smon lam btab pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de /
K10D0353_H0361:211a-3: sdig pa'i las byang nas mir skyes te; sangs rgyas dang phrad pas zag pa zad par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:211a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0353_H0361:211a-6: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drin dran par gyis shig /
K10D0353_H0361:211a-7: de nas de ltar drin du gzo bar shes nas /
K10D0353_H0361:211a-9: dge ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba ni /
K10D0353_H0361:211a-10: phan pa'i don 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin no zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:211a-11: de'i tshe sems can tshad med pa brgya stong snyed
K10D0353_H0361:211a-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0353_H0361:211a-13: chub tu sems bskyed pa nas nyan thos dang /
K10D0353_H0361:211a-14: rang sangs rgyas kyi bar du sems bskyed do //
K10D0353_H0361:211a-15: 'khor mang po rnams sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la
K10D0353_H0361:211a-16: rab tu dga' nas phyag byas te phyir dong ngo
K10D0353_H0361:211a-17: // thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las /
K10D0353_H0361:211a-18: bstan bcos kyi le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o ////
K10D0353_H0361:211a-20: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la 'khor bzhi pos mdun gyis byas nas mchod pa byas /
K10D0353_H0361:211a-23: tshig gis bstod pa byas so //
K10D0353_H0361:211a-24: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzum pa mdzad de /
K10D0353_H0361:211b-0: zhal gyi sgo nas 'od @211b zer sngon po dang /
K10D0353_H0361:211b-4: snying rje chen po zhes bya ba bkye nas phyogs
K10D0353_H0361:211b-5: bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa'i rtse mo man
K10D0353_H0361:211b-6: chad sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad kyi
K10D0353_H0361:211b-7: bar du snang bar byas nas /

K10D0353_H0361:211b-18: sdug bsngal las thar par mdzad do //

K10D0353_H0361:211b-20: lhas byin 'di ni tshe 'di 'ba' zhig la nga

K10D0353_H0361:211b-22: pa'i dus na yang nga la rtag tu gnod la
K10D0353_H0361:211b-24: snying rje'i shugs kyis rtag par phan pa dang /

K10D0353_H0361:212a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos po de dag bstan du gsol /
K10D0353_H0361:212a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /

K10D0353_H0361:212a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0353_H0361:212a-12: sngon lo tshad med pa stong 'das pa'i pha rol na /
K10D0353_H0361:212a-13: yul w'a ra n'a si zhes bya bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
K10D0353_H0361:212a-16: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K10D0353_H0361:212a-21: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10D0353_H0361:212a-23: ston pa rgyal ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K10D0353_H0361:212a-24: lo stong phrag bcu'i bar du sems can gyi don mdzad nas mya ngan las 'das so //
K10D0353_H0361:212a-26: dam pa'i chos lo khri phrag nyi shu'i bar du gnas par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:212a-27: gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyang nub cing med par gyur nas /
K10D0353_H0361:212a-28: yul w'a ra n'a si zhes bya ba'i rgyal po ma h'a r'a dz'a zhes bya ba /
K10D0353_H0361:212b-0: rang bzhin gyis dge zhing @212b mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa /
K10D0353_H0361:212b-1: yang dag pa'i chos kyis yul kyi srid 'tsho ste /
K10D0353_H0361:212b-2: mi rnams kyang bde skyid do //
K10D0353_H0361:212b-3: rgyal po de mtha'i rgyal phran drug cu dang /
K10D0353_H0361:212b-4: grong khyer chen po brgyad brgya la dbang [?] sgyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:212b-5: bal gyi glang po che lnga brgya yang yod do //
K10D0353_H0361:212b-6: btsun mo nyi khri yod kyang sras med pas rgyal po de rgyun du 'jig rten gyi lha dang /
K10D0353_H0361:212b-9: shing gi lha rnams la mchod 'brang byed cing /
K10D0353_H0361:212b-11: lo bcu gnyis lon pa dang /

K10D0353_H0361:212b-21: de ltar zla ba bcu'i bar rim gro byas nas /
K10D0353_H0361:212b-22: btsun mo chen mo la sras mnga' byad bzang la mdzes shing mtshan bzang pos brgyan pa /
K10D0353_H0361:212b-23: mi'i mtshan rdzogs par ldan pa zhig byung ngo //

K10D0353_H0361:212b-28: sras bu bstan nas mtshan bstan no //

K10D0353_H0361:212b-30: rgyal bu mtshan gdags pa'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:212b-31: sras bu 'di bltams pa'i tshe ltas ji lta bu byung zhes dris so /
K10D0353_H0361:213a-1: rgyal po chen po'i yum btsun mo chen mo ni
K10D0353_H0361:213a-2: sngon rang bzhin gyis khro ba phrag dog che la
K10D0353_H0361:213a-3: / nga rgyal byed pa las sras mngal du chags
K10D0353_H0361:213a-4: nas ni rang bzhin gyis dge des par gyur nas
K10D0353_H0361:213a-5: / / rtag tu 'dzum pa dang ldan zhing sems

K10D0353_H0361:213a-7: shing brtse ba'i sems kyis 'dzum pa dang ldan zhing
K10D0353_H0361:213a-8: gsong por smra bar gyur to //

K10D0353_H0361:213a-10: btsun mo 'bring mo la sras mnga' ba'i tshe snga ltas ji lta bu byung zhes dris na /
K10D0353_H0361:213a-11: sras bu 'di'i ma rang bzhin gyis dge zhing des
K10D0353_H0361:213a-12: te 'dzum pa dang ldan zhing tshig gis sngar srong
K10D0353_H0361:213a-13: por smra zhing kun gyis yid tshim par byed pa
K10D0353_H0361:213a-14: las sras mngal du chags nas rang bzhin gyis khro
K10D0353_H0361:213a-15: zhing zhe sdang che ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:213a-17: nga rgyal byed par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:213a-19: 'di yang sras bu'i sngon gyi las 'phro yin pas /
K10D0353_H0361:213a-20: sras bu'i mtshan ngan don zhes btags so //
K10D0353_H0361:213a-21: de nas rgyal bu gnyis gsos bskyed de /
K10D0353_H0361:213a-23: rgyal bu dge don rang bzhin gyis mkhas pa'i blo dang /
K10D0353_H0361:213a-24: byams pa'i sems su ldan te /
K10D0353_H0361:213a-25: sbyin pa byed pa la dga' bas /
K10D0353_H0361:213a-26: pha ma yang lhag par sras bu de la mig dang 'dra bar sdug par sems so //
K10D0353_H0361:213b-0: rgyal bu ngan @213b ngon ni rang bzhin gyis khro bas na /
K10D0353_H0361:213b-1: pha ma yang de la mi dga' ste /
K10D0353_H0361:213b-2: sdang bas rgyal bu ngan don rgyun du phrag dog byed de /
K10D0353_H0361:213b-3: phu po la gnod pa bya bar sems so //
K10D0353_H0361:213b-4: phyis dus gzhan zhig na rgyal bu dge don 'khor
K10D0353_H0361:213b-5: dang bcas pha rol mo byed cing pho brang gi
K10D0353_H0361:213b-6: phyi rol tu ltad mo lta zhing 'chag tu song
K10D0353_H0361:213b-7: ba las / zhing rmo ba dag zhing rmo ba'i
K10D0353_H0361:213b-8: rol nas srin bu dag byung ba la bya mang
K10D0353_H0361:213b-9: pos thu zhing za ba mthong ngo //

K10D0353_H0361:213b-11: bdag ni pho brang zab mo nas skyes pas /
K10D0353_H0361:213b-12: 'di lta bu'i dngos po ma mthong ma thos na /
K10D0353_H0361:213b-13: 'khor rnams la 'di dag ci'i phyir gcig la gcig gnod pa byed cing za zhes dris so //
K10D0353_H0361:213b-14: 'khor rnams kyis rgyal bu la smras pa /
K10D0353_H0361:213b-15: da ltar rgyal bu mnga' ba'i yul 'di yang 'bangs la rten te /
K10D0353_H0361:213b-16: 'bangs kyang kha zas la ltos te /
K10D0353_H0361:213b-17: kha zas ni zhing rmos pa las 'bru sna lnga skyes te /
K10D0353_H0361:213b-23: bud med dag skud pa 'khal ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:213b-25: phan tshun bskyod cing nyon mongs pa mthong ngo //

K10D0353_H0361:214a-9: lug gsod cing lpags pa bshu ba dag mthong nas /

K10D0353_H0361:214a-20: bskal ba bgrangs pa'i bar du gcig la gcig gsod

K10D0353_H0361:214a-31: gsod pa'i las 'di lta bu byed cing bgo ba dang /

K10D0353_H0361:214b-0: brang du 'ongs @214b so; ;yab rgyal pos rgyal bu
K10D0353_H0361:214b-1: mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed pa'i tshul gyis phyir
K10D0353_H0361:214b-3: rgyal bu la ci zhig gis mi dga' zhes dris pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:214b-4: rgyal bus kyang ji ltar mthong ba'i dngos po de dag yab rgyal po la zhib tu gsol lo //
K10D0353_H0361:214b-5: rgyal pos rgyal bu la smras pa /

K10D0353_H0361:215a-5: rgyal bus ma mchis par bgyis kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:215a-7: dgongs shig ces gsol pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:215a-9: nga ni rgyal bu'i yid dang 'gal bar byed mi nus so zhes bka' stsal to //

K10D0353_H0361:215a-14: khyod kyis thabs ci legs su cung zad bkag ste /

K10D0353_H0361:215a-21: 'di skad du bang mdzod la dbang ba'i blon po

K10D0353_H0361:215a-27: rin po che btsal la sems can thams cad la tshim par bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:215b-0: gal te bdag gis sems can @215b thams cad la bgo ba dang /

K10D0353_H0361:215b-11: zhing rmo ba las 'da' ba med de /
K10D0353_H0361:215b-13: yang blon po gcig gis smras pa /

K10D0353_H0361:215b-16: spogs de las che ba med do //
K10D0353_H0361:215b-17: yang blon po gcig gis smras pa /
K10D0353_H0361:215b-18: 'jig rten khe spogs shig bya na /
K10D0353_H0361:215b-19: rgya mtshor zhugs la nor bu rin po che btsal ba las 'da' ba med do //
K10D0353_H0361:215b-20: gal te yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed na /
