K10D0353_H0361:215b-25: bdag ni rgya mtsho chen por zhugs shing /
K10D0353_H0361:215b-26: nor bu rin po che len du 'gro bar 'dod do zhes gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:215b-27: rgyal pos tshig de thos nas; dper na /
K10D0353_H0361:215b-28: mi brnangs pa ltar skyug tu yang med la ming du yang med pa ltar /
K10D0353_H0361:215b-30: rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:215b-31: yul 'di yang khyod kyi yul yin te /
K10D0353_H0361:216a-2: rin po che ci yod pa yang khyod dbang bas yid bzhin du spyad du yod pas na /
K10D0353_H0361:216a-3: bdag nyid rgya mtshor 'jug ci dgos /
K10D0353_H0361:216a-4: khyod ni rgyal po'i sras yin te /
K10D0353_H0361:216a-5: pho brang zab mo'i nang du skyes pas /
K10D0353_H0361:216a-6: nyal na ni gur yol ba can gyis bskor /
K10D0353_H0361:216a-7: kha zas ni ci 'dod pa dang ldan te /
K10D0353_H0361:216a-8: da lam du zhugs te 'dron du 'gro na /
K10D0353_H0361:216a-9: nyon mongs shing bkres pa dang /

K10D0353_H0361:216a-34: de'i tshe rgyal po chen po dang /

K10D0353_H0361:216b-0: @216b mig mi 'dzum pa ltar lta zhing /

K10D0353_H0361:216b-3: ces thabs sna tshogs kyis spro ba bskyed kyang /
K10D0353_H0361:216b-4: rgyal bu dge don mnyan te /
K10D0353_H0361:216b-5: bdag rgya mtsho chen por mchir mi gnang na /

K10D0353_H0361:216b-27: de'i tshe na btsun mo chen mos /
K10D0353_H0361:216b-28: rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:216b-29: rgyal bus bsams pa'i sems 'di shin tu bskyod dka' bas /
K10D0353_H0361:217a-0: rgyal bu 'di nyid du tshe'i dus byed par thugs @217a *//

K10D0353_H0361:217a-16: da ltar langs te rab tu dga' nas bza' ba

K10D0353_H0361:217b-0: gyi bar du bgo ba @217b dang; kha zas dang

K10D0353_H0361:218a-15: 'di yang song na lam yang ba'am /

K10D0353_H0361:218b-12: rgyal bu'i snying rje'i sems dang /
K10D0353_H0361:218b-13: bsod nams kyi shugs kyis nye zho med par rgya
K10D0353_H0361:218b-14: mtsho'i gling nor bu rin po che'i drung du phyin
K10D0353_H0361:218b-15: to // rin po che'i drung du phyin nas rgyal bu dge don gyis /
K10D0353_H0361:218b-17: mi mang po la lam ring zhing yang bas /

K10D0353_H0361:239b-1: ldan pas thams cad la yid dang mi 'gal bar

K10D0353_H0361:239b-3: de'i tshe na mtha'i rgyal phran gcig rgyal po de la mi dga' ste /
K10D0353_H0361:239b-5: rgyal po 'od zer chen pos zla ba ngo re re zhing /
K10D0353_H0361:239b-6: dus drug gi nyi ma dang sbyar te /
K10D0353_H0361:239b-7: bal gyi glang po che lnga brgya la rin po che dang /
K10D0353_H0361:239b-11: btung ba bkal te; tshong dus dang /
K10D0353_H0361:239b-12: grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir spungs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:239b-13: thams cad la sbyin pa byed do //
K10D0353_H0361:239b-14: de'i tshe rgyal phran dgrar gyur pa des /
K10D0353_H0361:239b-15: de ltar rgyal po 'od zer chen pos thams cad la yid dang mi 'gal bar gos dang /
K10D0353_H0361:239b-19: rin po che'i bar du ci 'dod pa las sbyin pa byed do zhes thos nas /
K10D0353_H0361:239b-20: mtha'i rgyal phran des rgyal po 'od zer chen po
K10D0353_H0361:239b-21: sbyin pa'i bsod nams byed pa la phrag dog gi
K10D0353_H0361:239b-22: sems skyes te / blon po rnams bsdus nas /
K10D0353_H0361:239b-23: khyed rnams las su zhig w'a ra n'a si'i rgyal
K10D0353_H0361:239b-24: po 'od zer chen po'i mgo slong du 'gro nus
K10D0353_H0361:239b-26: blon po rnams kyis bdag cag ni gang yang rngo mi thogs zhes smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:239b-27: de nas yang thams cad la bkar btags te /
K10D0353_H0361:239b-28: su zhig w'a ra n'a si'i rgyal po 'od zer
K10D0353_H0361:239b-29: chen po'i mgo bslangs te 'ongs na gser rgya ma
K10D0353_H0361:239b-30: stong sbyin no zhes bkar btags pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:239b-31: bram ze gcig gis bdag gis slong du 'gro nus kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:240a-2: yul 'di nas w'a ra n'a sir rgyang grags drug stong yod pas de bzhin du rgyags dang /
K10D0353_H0361:240a-4: bram ze w'a ra n'a sir song ngo //
K10D0353_H0361:240a-5: de'i tshe bram ze de yul w'a ra n'a si'i yul phyogs der phyin pa las /
K10D0353_H0361:240a-6: sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu g-yos /
K10D0353_H0361:240a-8: ri dvags rnams kyang skrag nas phyogs bzhir bros /
K10D0353_H0361:240a-10: zla ba yang bsgribs pa bzhin mi gsal zhing mi snang bar gyur /
K10D0353_H0361:240a-12: skar ma rnams kyang dus bzhin du mi rgyu /
K10D0353_H0361:240a-13: 'ja' lta bu dmar po dang; nag po dang /
K10D0353_H0361:240a-15: nyin mtshan dus dus su snang /
K10D0353_H0361:240a-16: skar ma yang 'khrug cing lhung bar gyur /
K10D0353_H0361:240a-21: 'bras bu'i shing rgyas pa yid du 'ong ba rnams kyang bskams par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:240a-22: de nas bram ze de yang yul w'a ra n'a si'i rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo phyin to //
K10D0353_H0361:240a-23: de'i tshe na pho brang gi sgo srung ba'i lhas
K10D0353_H0361:240a-24: sgo srung ba'i mi la 'di skad ces smras so
K10D0353_H0361:240a-25: // bram ze ma rungs pa 'di lam ring po
K10D0353_H0361:240a-26: nas rgyal po 'od zer chen po'i dge slong du
K10D0353_H0361:240a-27: // 'ongs kyi / khyod nang du ma btang shig /
K10D0353_H0361:240a-28: de nas bram ze de pho brang nang du 'gror med de /
K10D0353_H0361:240a-29: zhag bdun gyi bar zhu sdod sdod nas sgo srung de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:240b-0: bdag ni lam ring po nas 'ongs @240b te; rgyal
K10D0353_H0361:240b-1: po chen po dang 'phrad 'dod do zhes gsol cig
K10D0353_H0361:240b-2: / de nas sgo srung gyis kyang de bzhin du
K10D0353_H0361:240b-3: bram ze gcig lam ring po nas 'ongs te da
K10D0353_H0361:240b-4: ltar sdod do zhes gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:240b-5: rgyal pos tshig de thos nas de ma thag tu sgor byung ste /
K10D0353_H0361:240b-6: bsus nas ji ltar pha dang bu phrad pa bzhin du phyag byas te /
K10D0353_H0361:240b-8: lam du nyon mongs shing ngal bar ma gyur tam zhes smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:240b-10: bdag yul gzhan nas rgyal po khyod kyis mi'i yid
K10D0353_H0361:240b-11: dang mi 'gal bar sbyin pa gtong ba'i yon tan
K10D0353_H0361:240b-12: thos te / khyod kyis ming snyan pa ni gnam sa'i bar kun tu grags nas /
K10D0353_H0361:240b-13: khyod kyi yon tan mi rdzun te bden no zhes
K10D0353_H0361:240b-14: thos pas bdag kyang ched du la lung bgrod de
K10D0353_H0361:240b-17: bdag ni da ltar thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ste /
K10D0353_H0361:240b-19: dgos pa yod na the tshom ma byed par slongs shig /
K10D0353_H0361:240b-22: bdag ni gzhan ni ci yang mi dgos kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:240b-23: mchod sbyin chen po zhig byed pas /
K10D0353_H0361:240b-24: rgyal po'i mgo slong du 'ongs so //
K10D0353_H0361:240b-25: rgyal pos tshig de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te /
K10D0353_H0361:240b-26: bdag thog ma med pa nas skye shir 'khor te /
K10D0353_H0361:240b-28: tshul bzhin chos kyi phyir ni ma yin gyi don
K10D0353_H0361:240b-29: med par skye shir 'khor bas bdag nyon mongs so
K10D0353_H0361:241a-1: 'dis sems can thams cad kyi phyir bla na med pa'i byang chub bsgrub par dam bcas pas /
K10D0353_H0361:241a-2: da ma byin par gyur na /
K10D0353_H0361:241a-3: bdag gi thog mar bsams pa dang yang 'gal la /
K10D0353_H0361:241a-4: gal te lus 'di ma byin na /
K10D0353_H0361:241a-5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0353_H0361:241a-6: chub thob par yang ji ltar 'gyur snyam bsams nas
K10D0353_H0361:241a-7: bram ze la shin tu dga'o //
K10D0353_H0361:241a-8: bdag yul srid kyi gdams pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:241a-11: de dag la bsgo ba cung zad byas te /
K10D0353_H0361:241a-12: de nas zhag bdun na khyod 'dod pa sbyin no
K10D0353_H0361:241a-13: zhes smras so; ;de nas rgyal po chen po pho
K10D0353_H0361:241a-14: brang gi nang du song nas /
K10D0353_H0361:241a-15: btsun mo rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o //
K10D0353_H0361:241a-16: gnam sa'i bang na mdza' zhing sdug pa thams cad ni bye zhing 'bral bar 'gyur /
K10D0353_H0361:241a-17: mi la skye ba yod na 'chi ba yod de /
K10D0353_H0361:241a-18: grub pa srid na 'jig pa yang srid de /
K10D0353_H0361:241a-19: dbyar sa las ci skyes pa thams cad kyang dgun ni kun bskam par 'gyur ro zhes smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:241a-22: rgyal pos smras pa'i tshig de thos te /
K10D0353_H0361:241a-26: mid du yang med pa ltar gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:241a-27: rgyal po la ci'i slad du /
K10D0353_H0361:241a-28: 'di skad gsungs zhes gsol pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:241a-29: rgyal pos 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:241a-30: bram ze zhig lam ring po nas 'ongs te nga'i
K10D0353_H0361:241b-0: mgo slong du 'ongs @241b so; ;ngas kyang sbyin par
K10D0353_H0361:241b-2: rgyal bu rnams kyis tshig de thos nas /
K10D0353_H0361:241b-3: lus sa la brdabs nas cho nges btab nas /
K10D0353_H0361:241b-5: gos kyang gshags dral te 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:241b-7: 'jig rten na bdag gi lus las phangs pa med na /
K10D0353_H0361:241b-8: ci'i slad du 'di lta bu shin tu btang dka'
K10D0353_H0361:241b-9: ba gtang zhing sbyin pa mdzad ces gsol to; ;de'i
K10D0353_H0361:241b-10: tshe na blon po lnga brgyas kyang bram ze la
K10D0353_H0361:241b-12: 'di ltar rnag khrag dang bcas pa /
K10D0353_H0361:241b-13: mnam zhing btsog pa'i mgo 'di cir dgos zhes smras pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:241b-16: bdag gis bslangs pa la khyed kyis drir yang ci yod /
K10D0353_H0361:241b-17: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K10D0353_H0361:241b-18: khyod bdag cag gi yul du 'ongs pas /
K10D0353_H0361:241b-19: bdag cag gis kyang dri zhing khyod kyang tshul bzhin du smra ba'i rigs so //
K10D0353_H0361:241b-20: de nas bram zes drang por smrar yang blon po
K10D0353_H0361:241b-21: rnams kyis srog gi dbang po dang phral du dogs
K10D0353_H0361:241b-22: nas 'jigs pas cang ma smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:241b-23: de nas blon po lnga brgyas bram ze la khyod ma skrag cig /
K10D0353_H0361:241b-24: khyod la mi 'jigs pa sbyin no zhes smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:241b-25: de nas bram ze de la bram ze dbul po
K10D0353_H0361:241b-26: khyod la rnag khrag gi mgo mnam po de ci
K10D0353_H0361:241b-27: zhig tu rung / nged blon po lnga brgyas mi
K10D0353_H0361:241b-28: gcig cing yang rin po che sna bdun las byas
K10D0353_H0361:241b-30: ci dgos pa yang mi rabs bdun gyi bar du chog par sbyin no zhes smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:242a-3: blon po chen po rnams kyang bsam ba ltar ma gyur nas /
K10D0353_H0361:242a-4: mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te /
K10D0353_H0361:242a-5: skad phyung ste dus nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:242a-7: bram ze mi gcig gi phyir yul sa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:242a-10: rgyal bu la sogs pa thams cad bor te /
K10D0353_H0361:242a-11: bdag cag gtan drar bor zhing lus par thugs kyis bzod dam /
K10D0353_H0361:242a-13: da ni khyed sems can thams cad kyi phyir lus 'di stong zhing sbyin pa byed do //
K10D0353_H0361:242a-14: de'i tshe na blon po nang gi chen po gcig gis rgyal pos gsungs pa thos pas /
K10D0353_H0361:242a-15: rgyal pos ni gdon mi za bar bram ze 'di
K10D0353_H0361:242a-16: la sku gtong ngo bar chad do snyam bsams nas
K10D0353_H0361:242a-17: / bdag ji ltar rgyal po lus gtong ba la
K10D0353_H0361:242a-18: snying mi bzod cing lta bar mi bya snyam bsams
K10D0353_H0361:242a-19: / nas / khang pa dben par song ste mtshon rnon po thogs te /
K10D0353_H0361:242a-21: de nas rgyal po chen po pho brang gis rgyab kyi ra bar song ste /
K10D0353_H0361:242a-25: khyod la byams shing brtse ba'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:242a-28: sbyin pa 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus su shes rab kyi mgo thob par gyur cig ces smras nas /
K10D0353_H0361:242a-29: thal mo sbyar te phyogs bcur phyag byas so //
K10D0353_H0361:242a-30: phyag byas nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:242b-0: @242b phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /
K10D0353_H0361:242b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te /
K10D0353_H0361:242b-2: bdag gi bsam pa 'di grub par byin gyis brlab
K10D0353_H0361:242b-3: tu gsol zhes smras nas bram ze la da khyod
K10D0353_H0361:242b-4: la sbyin gyi khyer cig ces smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:242b-6: rgyal po la gyad gyi stobs yod de /
K10D0353_H0361:242b-7: na tsha mi bzod pas phyir bdag la gnod par 'gyur gyi /
K10D0353_H0361:242b-8: rgyal po khyod yang dag par de ltar nus na rgyal po nyid kyi skra bkrol te /
K10D0353_H0361:242b-10: rgyal pos tshig de thos nas /
K10D0353_H0361:242b-11: lhag par snying brtse ba'i sems skyes te /
K10D0353_H0361:242b-12: bram ze 'di rid la nyam chung bas /
K10D0353_H0361:242b-13: gal te bdag gi mgo gcod ma nus na /
K10D0353_H0361:242b-14: bdag gi bsam pa chen po mi 'grub bo snyam bsams nas /
K10D0353_H0361:242b-15: rgyal po nyid kyis thor to shing la btags te;
K10D0353_H0361:242b-16: bram ze la khyod bdag gi mgo chod la phyir
K10D0353_H0361:242b-17: bdag gi lag par zhog cig /
K10D0353_H0361:242b-18: bdag gi lag gis khyod la sbyin par bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:242b-19: de nas bram ze ral gri thogs nas drung du spags pa las /
K10D0353_H0361:242b-20: de'i tshe shing de'i lhas bram ze la /
K10D0353_H0361:242b-21: dmigs tshugs byas pas brgyal te sa la 'gyel to //
K10D0353_H0361:242b-22: de nas rgyal po 'od zer chen pos shing gi lha la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:242b-23: khyod kho bo'i grogs mi byed par /
K10D0353_H0361:242b-24: phyir kho bo'i dge ba'i bgegs dang /
K10D0353_H0361:242b-26: de nas shing gi lha mya ngan gyis gdungs te /
K10D0353_H0361:243a-1: par char pa khrag tu bab ste /
K10D0353_H0361:243a-2: sa chen po yang rab tu g-yos /
K10D0353_H0361:243a-3: nyi ma yang mi gsal zhing mun par gyur /
K10D0353_H0361:243a-4: de nas bram zes rgyal po'i mgo bcad de phyir yul du song ngo //
K10D0353_H0361:243a-5: de nas rgyal bu lnga brgyas blon po rnams dang /
K10D0353_H0361:243a-6: rgyal po 'od zer chen po'i rus bu bsdus nas /
K10D0353_H0361:243a-7: mchod rten brtsigs te mchod pa byas so //
K10D0353_H0361:243a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0353_H0361:243a-9: de'i tshe de'i dus na blon po nang gi chen pos /
K10D0353_H0361:243a-10: rgyal po 'od zer chen pos mgo sbyin pa chen
K10D0353_H0361:243a-11: po byed pa la mthong bar snying mi bzod nas
K10D0353_H0361:243a-12: sngar tshe'i dus byas pa ni da ltar sh'a ri'i
K10D0353_H0361:243a-13: bu yin no // de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal
K10D0353_H0361:243a-14: po 'od zer chen por gyur pa de ni da
K10D0353_H0361:243a-15: ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa nga yin
K10D0353_H0361:243a-16: no; ;byang chub sems dpa' de ltar na shin tu
K10D0353_H0361:243a-17: spyad dka' ba spyad par dam bcas te /
K10D0353_H0361:243a-18: sems can thams cad kyi phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi drin bsabs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:243a-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so //
K10D0353_H0361:243a-20: de bas na sh'a ri'i bu yang nga mya ngan
K10D0353_H0361:243a-21: las 'da' ba mig gis mthong bar mi bzod pas
K10D0353_H0361:243a-23: sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang nga sbyin pa byed
K10D0353_H0361:243a-24: pa la mthong ba mi bzod nas sngar tshe'i dus
K10D0353_H0361:243a-25: byas so // pho brang rgyab kyi ra ba 'dir shing 'di kho na la /
K10D0353_H0361:243b-0: 'khor @243b los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byas pa'i mgo yang stong tshang bar yongs su btang na /
K10D0353_H0361:243b-1: lus kyi yan lag lag pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:243b-2: rkang pa la sogs pa sbyin pa byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10D0353_H0361:243b-3: sangs rgyas kyis dka' thub mdzad pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
K10D0353_H0361:243b-4: sems can tshad med pa brgya stong snyed bla na
K10D0353_H0361:243b-5: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
K10D0353_H0361:243b-8: mi tshad med pa brgya stong snyed ni rgyun du
K10D0353_H0361:243b-9: zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa nas dgra bcom pa'i
K10D0353_H0361:243b-10: 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:243b-12: mi tshad med pa brgya stong snyed ni nyan thos dang /
K10D0353_H0361:243b-13: rang sangs rgyas su sems bskyed do //
K10D0353_H0361:243b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa la /
K10D0353_H0361:243b-19: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa 'khor mang po thams cad mngon par dga' bas phyir dong ngo //
K10D0353_H0361:243b-22: yul ma ga dha na mi rgod ri brag pa lnga brgya zhig rtag tu chom po byed de /
K10D0353_H0361:243b-23: 'dron po phan tshun rgyur med par gyur nas /
K10D0353_H0361:243b-24: de'i tshe yul ma ga dha'i rgyal pos dmag rnam bzhi bshams te /
K10D0353_H0361:243b-25: mi rgod rnams phab nas mig phyung /
K10D0353_H0361:243b-27: sna yang bcad de; ri brag yang bar bor ro //
K10D0353_H0361:243b-28: de'i tshe na mi rgod lnga brgya po lus kyi na tshas sdug bsngal bar gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:244a-0: mi rgod lnga brgya po de'i nang na sangs rgyas kyi slob mar @244a *//
K10D0353_H0361:244a-3: bdag cag ni tshe'i dus byed pa las mi ring na /
K10D0353_H0361:244a-4: ci'i phyir kun gyis sangs rgyas la skyabs su mi gsol zhes smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:244a-5: de nas mi rgod lnga brgya rnams skad mthun par
K10D0353_H0361:244a-6: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
K10D0353_H0361:244a-7: smras pa dang / de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs
K10D0353_H0361:244a-8: pa bya rgod spungs pa'i ri la bzhugs pa las
K10D0353_H0361:244a-9: smras pa dang / / thugs rje chen po'i shugs
K10D0353_H0361:244a-10: kyis ri gan da ha zhes bya bar gshegs nas
K10D0353_H0361:244a-12: ri de la shing tsandan gyi tshal yod pa'i phye ma bus nas /
K10D0353_H0361:244a-13: nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang bar byas te /
K10D0353_H0361:244a-14: mi rgod rnams gnas pa'i ri la yang tsandan gyi phye ma phyin par gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:244a-15: tsandan gyi phye ma des mi rgod kyi rma'i steng du gos nas /
K10D0353_H0361:244a-18: lus kyi rma thams cad sos te /
K10D0353_H0361:244a-19: khrag kyang 'o mar gyur pas thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:244a-20: bdag cag ni sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen pos
K10D0353_H0361:244a-21: lus kyi rma kun sos te bde bar gyur te
K10D0353_H0361:244a-22: / sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin bsab pa'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:244a-23: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10D0353_H0361:244a-25: thams cad kyis tshig mthun par so so'i skye bo
K10D0353_H0361:244a-26: bde ba ma thob pa rnams ni bde ba thob
K10D0353_H0361:244b-0: par bya'o // ma grol ba rnams ni grol @244b par bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:244b-1: pha rol tu ma phyin pa rnams ni pha rol tu phyin par bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:244b-2: 'bras bu ma thob pa rnams ni 'bras bu thob par bya'o zhes dam bcas so //
K10D0353_H0361:244b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang thabs
K10D0353_H0361:244b-6: mkhas pa'i rdzu 'phrul ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo
K10D0353_H0361:244b-7: // sangs rgyas mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs pa'i tshe /

K10D0353_H0361:249b-4: de dag gi lus la gnod par mi 'gyur bar
K10D0353_H0361:249b-5: de'i ya lad kyi rgyun kun bcad de khrab kyi
K10D0353_H0361:249b-6: ya lad la lhags par bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:249b-8: sh'aka rigs kun gyis mda' 'phangs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:249b-9: khrab kyi rgyun kun bcad de sgren mor bzhag go /
K10D0353_H0361:249b-10: de nas rgyal bo khyod skrag nas da ni bdag
K10D0353_H0361:249b-11: cag gi srog la bab na ji ltar bya zhes
K10D0353_H0361:249b-12: bgros pa las / blon po gcig gis 'di skad ces gros ma btab bam /
K10D0353_H0361:249b-13: sh'aka rigs rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi slob ma yin pas srog mi gcod pa'i khrims srung ste /
K10D0353_H0361:249b-14: snying rje che bas bdag cag la gnod pa ma byas kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:249b-15: de lta ma yin na bdag cag gi lus dang /
K10D0353_H0361:249b-16: srog med par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas /
K10D0353_H0361:249b-17: da ltar bden na da rung du brgal lo zhes smras te /
K10D0353_H0361:249b-18: de'i tshe na sh'aka rigs kyi bu rnams ni lag pa mi 'gul bar sdod do //
K10D0353_H0361:249b-19: rgyal po bee d'urya'i dmag rnams bzhi drung du bsnyegs
K10D0353_H0361:249b-20: kyang sh'aka rigs kyi bu rnams mi rgol bar sdod
K10D0353_H0361:249b-21: do // de nas bram ze zhig 'dug pas sh'aka rigs rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:249b-22: da mi bde ba byung bzhin du ci'i phyir mi rgol bar sdod ces smras pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:249b-23: sh'aka rigs rnams kyis smras pa /
K10D0353_H0361:250a-1: la yang brtod pa med de /
K10D0353_H0361:250a-2: gal te 'di dang brtod par gyur na /
K10D0353_H0361:250a-3: sangs rgyas kyi slob mar mi rung ngo zhes smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:250a-4: de nas bran ze de dag gis smras pa la
K10D0353_H0361:250a-5: ma rangs te gcig pu sh'aka rigs kyi mdun du
K10D0353_H0361:250a-6: 'phags nas rgyal po bee d'urya'i dmag la brgal te
K10D0353_H0361:250a-7: / mda' gcig 'phangs bas mi bdun bdun rmas par byas pas /
K10D0353_H0361:250a-8: ring po ma thogs par rmas pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:250a-9: shi ba mang bar gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:250a-10: rgyal po khyod dmag rnam bzhi dang phyir ma log gam /
K10D0353_H0361:250a-12: sh'aka rigs rnams 'di snyam du sems par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:250a-13: bdag cag rnams bram ze sdig pa can 'di dang
K10D0353_H0361:250a-14: lhan cig 'dug cing 'grogs pa mi rigs so snyam
K10D0353_H0361:250a-15: bsams nas sh'aka rigs rnams 'dus nas bram ze de
K10D0353_H0361:250a-17: bram ze de bskrad pa'i 'og tu yang rgyal pos dmag rnam bzhi drangs na /
K10D0353_H0361:250a-18: yul ser skya phab nas rgyal bar byas pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:250a-19: de nas rgyal po bee d'urya skyengs te ngo tsha bar gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:250a-20: de nas rigs ngan pa'i bshan pa bkug nas /
K10D0353_H0361:250a-21: sh'aka rigs kyi bu mo rnams rkang pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:250a-24: rna ba bcad de shing rtas bskyas nas /
K10D0353_H0361:250a-26: de'i tshe sh'aka rigs kyi bu mo rnams rkang lag
K10D0353_H0361:250a-27: bcad nas sa la 'gre zhing sdug bsngal chen po
K10D0353_H0361:250b-0: myong bar gyur nas srog @250b la bab bo //
K10D0353_H0361:250b-1: de'i tshe sh'aka rigs kyi bu mo rnams sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pas /
K10D0353_H0361:250b-2: la la ni pha ma dang /
K10D0353_H0361:250b-7: la la ni rab tu sdug bsngal bar 'bod par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:250b-8: de'i nang na sh'aka rigs kyi bu mo mchog tu
K10D0353_H0361:250b-9: gyur pa gcig gis bu mo rnams la 'di skad
K10D0353_H0361:250b-10: ces smras so // phu nu mo dag /
K10D0353_H0361:250b-12: bdag gis sngon sangs rgyas las 'di ltar thos so //
K10D0353_H0361:250b-13: gang zhig phongs shing nyam thag par gyur pa na /
K10D0353_H0361:250b-14: sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas yid la byas te mtshan nas brjod la /
K10D0353_H0361:250b-15: srog phyogs na bsam pa bzhin du 'grub cing bde bar 'ong bar thos so //
K10D0353_H0361:250b-16: de na sh'aka rigs kyi bu mo lnga brgya rnams
K10D0353_H0361:250b-17: sems rtse gcig tu btud nas mthun par sangs rgyas
K10D0353_H0361:250b-18: sh'akya thub pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
K10D0353_H0361:250b-19: pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod de
K10D0353_H0361:250b-24: bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa zhes bos so //
K10D0353_H0361:250b-25: de skad smras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0353_H0361:250b-26: thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis steng gi nam mkha'
K10D0353_H0361:250b-27: la snying rje chen po'i sprin chags te /
K10D0353_H0361:250b-28: snying rje chen po'i sprin las char pa phab nas /
K10D0353_H0361:250b-29: char pa'i thig pas bu mo'i lus la phog go /
K10D0353_H0361:250b-30: char pas phog ma thag tu bu mo de dag
K10D0353_H0361:250b-31: gi lag pa rkang pa de dag la sogs pa
K10D0353_H0361:251a-0: snga mkho bzhin du sos par @251a *//
K10D0353_H0361:251a-2: de'i tshe sh'aka rigs kyi bu mo rnams rab tu dga' bar gyur nas /
K10D0353_H0361:251a-3: thams cad tshig mthun par de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i pha ma /
K10D0353_H0361:251a-5: bcom ldan 'das ni 'jig rten gyi sman dam pa'o //
K10D0353_H0361:251a-6: 'jig rten gyi snang ba'i spyan no //
K10D0353_H0361:251a-7: khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar mdzad pa'o //
K10D0353_H0361:251a-8: shin tu bde ba sbyin pa'o //
K10D0353_H0361:251a-10: bdag cag sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa las thar bar
K10D0353_H0361:251a-11: gyur pas bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyis bka' drin
K10D0353_H0361:251a-13: da sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin bsab par bya na
K10D0353_H0361:251a-14: thabs ji lta bu zhig gis bka' drin bsab par
K10D0353_H0361:251a-15: bya / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni rdo rje'i sku /
K10D0353_H0361:251a-24: byang chub kyi yan lag bsam gyis mi khyab pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
K10D0353_H0361:251a-25: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K10D0353_H0361:251a-26: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yongs su brgyan pa'o //
K10D0353_H0361:251a-27: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la
K10D0353_H0361:251a-28: gnas shing; sems can thams cad la sgra gcan 'dzin
K10D0353_H0361:251a-31: gnyen la yang mnyam par gzigs te lan mi re ba yin na /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-0: da bdag cag gi sangs @251b rgyas kyi bka' drin bsab par bya na /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-1: bdag cag rab tu byung ste /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-2: tshul khrims bsrungs la dam pa'i chos gzung ngo snyam bsams nas /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-5: dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang du song nas /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-7: dge slong ma'i gnas su phyin nas /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-8: dge slong ma drug sde sngar phrad par gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-9: dge slong ma drug sdes bdag cag la 'di skad ces bsgo'o //
K10D0353_H0361:251b-11: gzhon zhing lang tsho'i dus la bab la byad bzhin bzang la sdug na /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-12: ci'i phyir 'di lta bu gtang dka' ba gtong bar sems shing rab tu 'byung bar sems /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-13: de bas na 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa lnga las longs spyod na mi skyid dam /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-14: skyid pa myong nas tshe nar phyin te /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-15: rab tu byung na mi slebs sam zhes bsgo'o //
K10D0353_H0361:251b-16: drug sde ma rnams kyis bsams pa /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-17: 'di dag rab tu ma byung na gdon mi za bar bdag cag gi chos gos dang /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-19: 'dod pa thams cad dbul bar 'gyur ro bsams nas /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-20: sh'aka rigs kyi bu mo rnams rab tu 'byung ba'i bgegs byas so //
K10D0353_H0361:251b-21: bu mo rnams kyis tshig de thos nas lhag par
K10D0353_H0361:251b-22: mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis non par gyur te
K10D0353_H0361:251b-23: / ci'i phyir da dung yang 'di lta bu'i 'jigs pa chen po dang phrad par 'gyur /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-24: kha zas bzang po'i nang na dug ma rungs pa yod pa ltar /
K10D0353_H0361:251b-25: dge slong ma de dag kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K10D0353_H0361:252a-1: pa'i skyon mang bar bdag cag kyang shes na /
K10D0353_H0361:252a-2: ci'i phyir 'di dag de la yon tan du lta snyam bsams nas skad phyung ste dus so //
K10D0353_H0361:252a-4: song song ba las dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog dang phrad de /
K10D0353_H0361:252a-5: bdag cag la ci'i phyir du zhes dris so //
K10D0353_H0361:252a-6: bdag cag gis dge slong ma la bsam pa ltar ma gyur pas du ba yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:252a-8: autpa la'i mdog gis smras pa /
K10D0353_H0361:252a-9: khyed cir bsam na ma grub par gyur /
K10D0353_H0361:252a-10: bdag cag gis rab tu dbyung du gsol ba las /
K10D0353_H0361:252a-11: rab tu dbyung du ma gnang ngo //
K10D0353_H0361:252a-12: autpa la'i mdog gis smras pa /
K10D0353_H0361:252a-13: khyed rab tu 'byung bar dga' na kho mos rab tu dbyung ngo //
K10D0353_H0361:252a-14: sh'aka rigs kyi bu mo rnams rab tu dga' nas /
K10D0353_H0361:252a-15: autpa la'i mdog gis slob mar rab tu byung ngo //
K10D0353_H0361:252a-16: de ltar rab tu byung nas thams cad 'dus te /
K10D0353_H0361:252a-18: bdag cag rnams rab tu ma byung ba na /
K10D0353_H0361:252a-19: sdug bsngal 'ga' tsam myong bar ma zad de /
K10D0353_H0361:252a-24: rkang lag kun bcad gtubs te /
K10D0353_H0361:252a-25: sdug bsngal mi bzad mi srid pa myong ngo; ;autpa la'i mdog gis smras pa /
K10D0353_H0361:252a-26: khyed kyis sdug bsngal de tsam myong ba la gtam yang byar ci yod /
K10D0353_H0361:252b-0: kho mo rab tu ma byung ba tsam na sdug bsngal myong ba'i gtam de mi @252b gtol to //
K10D0353_H0361:252b-1: sh'aka rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis thal mo sbyar
K10D0353_H0361:252b-2: nas slob dpon ma la rab tu ma byung ba'i
K10D0353_H0361:252b-3: tshe / sdug bsngal ji lta bu myong ba bstan du gsol zhes smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:252b-4: de nas dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:252b-5: mngon par shes pa'i mthus 'od zer chen po bkye ste /
K10D0353_H0361:252b-6: 'dzam bu'i gling snang bar byas nas /
K10D0353_H0361:252b-7: las dang rgyu mthun pas lha dang /
K10D0353_H0361:252b-11: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa bsdus nas /
K10D0353_H0361:252b-12: 'khor mang po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:252b-13: kho mo rab tu ma byung ba na yul mnyan
K10D0353_H0361:252b-14: du yod pa can na 'dug pa na; kho mo'i
K10D0353_H0361:252b-15: pha mas byang phyogs na 'dug pa la bag mar
K10D0353_H0361:252b-16: btang ngo // byang phyogs kyi mi de dag gi
K10D0353_H0361:252b-17: yul chos kyi bu btsa' kar phyir pha ma'i yul
K10D0353_H0361:252b-19: de bzhin du lo du mar de ltar snga phyir bu btsas nas phyis bu zhig btsa' ba'i tshe /
K10D0353_H0361:252b-20: khyim thab dang 'grogs te bzhon pa rta dang theg
K10D0353_H0361:252b-21: par bcas te pha ma'i yul du song ba las
K10D0353_H0361:252b-22: / lam phyed du phyin pa las chu klung yod pa chu brug ste /
K10D0353_H0361:252b-23: mthar nas de'i nub mo 'brog dgon pa'i chu 'gram der nyal lo //
K10D0353_H0361:252b-24: de'i nub mo bu btsas pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:252b-25: rtsva'i nang nas sprul gdug pa yod pa khrag gi dri tshor nas /
K10D0353_H0361:252b-26: bdag bu btsas pa'i phyogs su 'ongs so //
K10D0353_H0361:252b-27: bdag gi drung du ma phyin pas bdag gi khyim thab dang bran nyal ba'i steng du 'ongs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:252b-28: btsugs te sngar bran bsad do //
K10D0353_H0361:253a-1: nas khyim thab kyi thog tu 'ongs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:253a-4: zhes khyim thab la bos na /
K10D0353_H0361:253a-5: ma tshor te khyim thab kyang bsad do; ;de nas rta dang /
K10D0353_H0361:253a-9: phyi de nyin nam nangs nas bltas na /
K10D0353_H0361:253a-10: khyim thab kyi ro yang bam zhing /
K10D0353_H0361:253a-11: sa la khrag btsog btsog ltar 'dug pa mthong nas /
K10D0353_H0361:253a-12: kho mo skrag 'khams nas sa la 'gyel to //
K10D0353_H0361:253a-13: de nas skad chen po phyung ste dus nas /
K10D0353_H0361:253a-15: skra yang 'bal nas ro'i steng du 'gyel to //
K10D0353_H0361:253a-16: de bzhin du zhag du mar chu la ma thar te /
K10D0353_H0361:253a-17: chu 'gram na 'dug 'dug pa las phyis chu brug pa bri nas /
K10D0353_H0361:253a-18: bu chen po tshu rol tu bzhag /
K10D0353_H0361:253a-19: bu 'bring po khur du khyer; bu chung du thu ba'i nang du bcug thub sos gzung ste /
K10D0353_H0361:253a-20: chu 'bogs pa las chu phyed du phyin pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:253a-22: bu chen po stag cig 'ongs nas bzung ba mthong
K10D0353_H0361:253a-23: ba dang; kha gdangs te khus btab pa las thu
K10D0353_H0361:253a-25: bu chung du chur lhung ngo //
K10D0353_H0361:253a-26: bu chung du bstabs pa las rgyab na yod pa'i bu yang shor nas bu kun shi'o //
K10D0353_H0361:253a-27: de ltar bu gcig stag gis zos /
K10D0353_H0361:253a-28: gzhan chur shi nas bdag pha rol tu phyin te /
K10D0353_H0361:253a-29: snying gas pa tsam du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:253b-1: nang gcig tu 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba mthong bar gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:253b-2: zhes du zhing 'dug 'dug pa las ring po ma
K10D0353_H0361:253b-3: thogs par 'dron po mang po zhig der lhags so
K10D0353_H0361:253b-4: // de'i tshe na 'dren po de dag ni nang
K10D0353_H0361:253b-5: na khyim bdag gcig cig kho mo'i pha ma dang
K10D0353_H0361:253b-6: mdza' zhing bshes pa zhig ste /
K10D0353_H0361:253b-7: kho mo de'i gan du song ste pha ma'i gtam
K10D0353_H0361:253b-8: dris so; ;de la khyim bdag de 'di skad ces
K10D0353_H0361:253b-9: smras so // khyod kyi pha ma dang /
K10D0353_H0361:253b-10: khyim du me shor te khyim yang tshig go /
K10D0353_H0361:253b-11: khyod kyi pha ma yang tshig go /
K10D0353_H0361:253b-12: bdag gis tshig de thos nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel to //
K10D0353_H0361:253b-13: de nas ring zhig lon pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:253b-14: phyir sangs te song song ba las grogs po rnams mi rgod lnga brgya dang phrad de bcom mo //
K10D0353_H0361:253b-15: de'i tshe mi rgod kyis dpon pos bdag chung mar blangs nas rtag tu sgo srung du bcug go /
K10D0353_H0361:253b-16: sgo srung du bcug pa na rings drag cig byung
K10D0353_H0361:253b-17: ba na tshor sang cher byos la nang du spron
K10D0353_H0361:253b-18: cig ces bsgo'o // de nas dus gzhan zhig na
K10D0353_H0361:253b-19: khyim thab de mi rgod rnams dang 'phrog cing 'joms
K10D0353_H0361:253b-21: rgyal po'i grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis bdas nas nyam thag ste /
K10D0353_H0361:253b-22: phyir gnas su bros pa las de'i thad kar kho mo bu btsa' ba'i thad kar bab ste /
K10D0353_H0361:253b-23: khyim thab sgo na 'bod pa thos kyang sgo 'byed ma nus pas /
K10D0353_H0361:253b-24: de'i tshe khyim thab de 'di snyam du sems par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:254a-1: 'di ni nga la gnod pa byed par sems pa lta /
K10D0353_H0361:254a-2: sgo 'byed du yang ma btub bo snyam bsams nas /
K10D0353_H0361:254a-3: rtsig pa brgal nas nang du 'ongs so //
K10D0353_H0361:254a-4: des chung ma la ci'i phyir sgo mi 'byed ces byas so //
K10D0353_H0361:254a-8: de'i tshe na khyim thab de khros nas ji tsam du lus yod na bu yod par 'gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:254a-9: khyod nga la gnod pa byas pas bu de yod na yang ci ru rung /
K10D0353_H0361:254a-10: myur du sod cig ces bsgo'o //
K10D0353_H0361:254a-11: de'i tshe bdag bu la byams ches pas gsod ma
K10D0353_H0361:254a-12: phod do; ;de nas bdag gi khyim thab kyis ral
K10D0353_H0361:254a-13: gri phyung nas bu'i rkang lag bcad de sha 'di
K10D0353_H0361:254a-14: zo zhig / sha ma zos na mgo bcad do zhes smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:254a-15: de nas bdag skrag nas bu'i sha zos so //
K10D0353_H0361:254a-16: de ltar bu'i sha zos nas khro ba yang zhi bar gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:254a-17: de nas yang dus gzhan zhig na rku zhing 'phrog du song song ba las /
K10D0353_H0361:254a-19: khrims dang sbyar nas srog bcad do //
K10D0353_H0361:254a-20: de'i tshe na rgyal po de'i yul chos kyis rkun
K10D0353_H0361:254a-21: po bsad na yul chos kyis rkun po'i ro dang
K10D0353_H0361:254a-22: chung ma gson por dur du bcug go /
K10D0353_H0361:254a-23: kho mo rgyan dang bcas su dur du bcug par gzhan gyis mthong nas /
K10D0353_H0361:254a-24: de nas mod la gzhan gyis bdag gi rgyan 'dod
K10D0353_H0361:254a-25: pa'i phyir mtshan mo dur brus nas bdag kyang khrid
K10D0353_H0361:254b-0: de / chung mar blangs nas dur @254b rkun de
K10D0353_H0361:254b-1: yang ring po ma lon par yang rgyal pos zin
K10D0353_H0361:254b-2: nas khrims dang sbyar nas bsad do //
K10D0353_H0361:254b-3: yul chos kyis rkun po'i chung ma yang gson por ro dang dur du bcug go /
K10D0353_H0361:254b-4: de nas ring po ma lon par spyang ki ltogs
K10D0353_H0361:254b-5: pas ro zos nas phyir byung nas bdag kyang de
K10D0353_H0361:254b-6: nas thar te / myos bzhin du 'thom zhing song
K10D0353_H0361:254b-7: song ba las mi mang po zhig dang phrad de
K10D0353_H0361:254b-8: nas thar te / / de de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0353_H0361:254b-9: bdag shin tu sdug bsngal mang pos yongs su gzir bar gyur pas /
K10D0353_H0361:254b-10: nga mya ngan med pa'i gnas shig 'dod /

K10D0353_H0361:260a-0: @260a *// rab tu byung ba'i chos nyid do //
K10D0353_H0361:260a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar dga' bo la bstan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-3: dga' ba'i chos rnam pa du ma gsungs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-4: dga' bo rab tu dga' mgu rangs te /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-5: gos tshags bcos nas 'phags pa ma 'gags pa'i rkang ba la mgo bos phyag btsal ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-6: de ma thag tu gnams yang rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K10D0353_H0361:260a-8: sems mnyen zhing las su rung bar gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-9: bdag gi don rab tu rnyed cing bya ba byas par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:260a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa ma 'gags pa la /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-11: khyod kyis myur du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shig /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-16: rab tu byung ba'i 'khor bdun gyi khyad par dang /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-17: de dag gi skyabs su 'gro ba gsum dang /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-18: gtan khrims lnga nas tshul khrims thams cad kyi bar du /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-19: sems can la phan pa'i tshul khrims dang /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-20: nyon mongs pa sbyong ba'i tshul khrims dang /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-21: spyod lam gyis gdul ba'i tshul khrims dang /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-22: bsam gtan gyi tshul khrims dang /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-23: zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bstan te /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-24: dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyas par byos shig /
K10D0353_H0361:260a-26: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:260b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus @260b bdag la byin gyis brlabs na /
K10D0353_H0361:260b-1: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la cung zad cig zhu'o //
K10D0353_H0361:260b-3: dkon mchog gsum zhes bgyi ba gang lags /
K10D0353_H0361:260b-5: chos dang; dge 'dun zhes bgyi ba dkon mchog gsum la mtshan nyid ma mchis na /
K10D0353_H0361:260b-9: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ba ji ltar gzungs su gzung /
K10D0353_H0361:260b-12: gsum zhes gsung pa yang mi rigs /
K10D0353_H0361:260b-13: gal te skyabs su mchi ba gsum du gsungs na /
K10D0353_H0361:260b-14: ci'i slad du 'khor rnam pa bdun mchis par gsungs /
K10D0353_H0361:260b-16: ci la skyabs su mchi na /
K10D0353_H0361:260b-17: skyabs su mchi ba zhes bgyi /
K10D0353_H0361:260b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de dag so so nas rnam par bkrol te /
K10D0353_H0361:260b-20: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni tshor ba ste /
K10D0353_H0361:260b-21: chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad mngon sum du tshor ba'i phyir ro //
K10D0353_H0361:260b-22: gzhan yang; sems can thams cad ni khams gsum na rgyun du gnyid kyis myos te /
K10D0353_H0361:260b-23: sangs rgyas ni byang chub kyi spyan bye bas na
K10D0353_H0361:260b-24: bdag kyang tshor ba la pha rol po yang tshor
K10D0353_H0361:260b-25: bar byed pas tshor ba zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:260b-26: sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad la thabs thob pa thams cad gsungs pa'o //
K10D0353_H0361:260b-28: ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyis thams cad gsungs pa zhes bgyi ba lags //
K10D0353_H0361:261a-0: @261a *// 'on te dus tshod las ma yol bar dbang po
K10D0353_H0361:261a-1: ci dang 'phrod pa bzhin du gsungs pa la bgyi'am
K10D0353_H0361:261a-2: / 'on te so so'i sde tha dad pa bzhin du rjes su gsungs pa la bgyi /
K10D0353_H0361:261a-4: sangs rgyas ni dbang po ji bzhin du dus las mi yol bar chos thams cad gsungs na /
K10D0353_H0361:261a-5: phyis nye gnas rnams kyis chos kyi sde snod bsdus pa'i tshe mdo sde'i pag la bstan to //
K10D0353_H0361:261a-6: sangs rgyas kyis ni skabs kha cig tu nye gnas rnams la tshul khrims lci ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:261a-9: ltung ba med pa bcas te /
K10D0353_H0361:261a-11: skabs kha cig tu ni rgyu dang /
K10D0353_H0361:261a-12: 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid las nyon mongs pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:261a-13: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa skye bas /
K10D0353_H0361:261a-14: las kyi mtshan nyid gsungs te /
K10D0353_H0361:261a-15: chos mngon pa'i sde snod phye'o //
K10D0353_H0361:261a-17: mi'i 'jig rten du bcas pa la ci dang 'phrod pa bzhin du bstan cing gsungs pa ni /
K10D0353_H0361:261a-18: gzhung gcig nas 'phros pa zhes bya ste /
K10D0353_H0361:261a-19: 'dul ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa'i gang zag rnams kyis spyod pa'i las su gsungs so //
K10D0353_H0361:261a-20: sems can dbang po rnon po rnams la don zab
K10D0353_H0361:261a-21: mo rnam pa mang po gsungs pa ni; gzhung bar
K10D0353_H0361:261a-23: slob ma rnams kyi spyod pa'i las su gsungs so //
K10D0353_H0361:261a-24: bsam gtan gyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs gsungs pa ni gzhung sil bu zhes bya ste /
K10D0353_H0361:261b-0: gang @261b zag bsam gtan byed pa rnams kyi spyod pa'i las su gsungs so //
K10D0353_H0361:261b-1: mu stegs can mang po gzhig pa'i don du gzhung ring po gsungs so //
K10D0353_H0361:261b-3: gal te sangs rgyas thams cad gsungs pa la gnas nas /
K10D0353_H0361:261b-4: mdo sde las sangs rgyas shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du bzhugs te /
K10D0353_H0361:261b-5: shing de'i yal ga gcig gi 'dab ma las bzung
K10D0353_H0361:261b-6: nas nye gnas rnams la yal ga gzung ba 'di'i
K10D0353_H0361:261b-8: shing ljon pa chen po'i 'dab ma mang zhes bka' stsal nas /
K10D0353_H0361:261b-9: shing ljon pa'i 'dab ma mang ngo zhes gsol pa las /
K10D0353_H0361:261b-10: sangs rgyas kyis kyang ngas mkhyen pa'i chos ni shing ljon pa'i 'dab ma dang 'dra'o //
K10D0353_H0361:261b-11: ngas bshad pa'i chos ni lag pas gzung ba'i 'dab ma dang 'dra'o zhes gsungs nas /
K10D0353_H0361:261b-12: sangs rgyas thams cad gsungs pa'o zhes bgyir rung ngam /
K10D0353_H0361:261b-14: mtshan nyid tha dad pa thams cad kyi thams cad dang /
K10D0353_H0361:261b-15: mtshan nyid gcig pa thams cad kyi thams cad yod do //
K10D0353_H0361:261b-16: 'dir ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa thams cad la dgongs te /
K10D0353_H0361:261b-17: sangs rgyas ni thams cad gsungs pa'o zhes bshad do //
K10D0353_H0361:261b-18: de yang sems can gyis zad par gzung mi nus pa la bya yi /
K10D0353_H0361:261b-19: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs mi nus pa ni ma yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:261b-21: thams cad mkhyen pa la yang thams cad gsungs pa zhes bya yi /
K10D0353_H0361:262a-0: drang thabs su thams cad gsungs pa zhes byar mi @262a *//
K10D0353_H0361:262a-3: gal te sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pas gsungs pa lags na nyan thos dang /
K10D0353_H0361:262a-4: rang sangs rgyas kyang shes pa la brten te smra
K10D0353_H0361:262a-5: na; ci'i slad du de la yang sangs rgyas zhes
K10D0353_H0361:262a-7: de lta bu ma yin te /
K10D0353_H0361:262a-8: sangs rgyas ni mkhyen pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:262a-9: gsungs pa gnyi ga'i mthar phyin no //
K10D0353_H0361:262a-10: theg pa gnyis kyi shes pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:262a-11: smra ba ni chos kyi mthar ma phyin pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0353_H0361:262a-13: sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad chub par mkhyen pas /
K10D0353_H0361:262a-14: ming btags pa yang mkhyen gyi; theg pa gnyis kyis de ltar mi nus so //
K10D0353_H0361:262a-16: sangs rgyas ni chos brnyes pa yang mtha' yas la /
K10D0353_H0361:262a-17: chos gsungs pa yang mtha' yas te /
K10D0353_H0361:262a-18: theg pa gnyis ni de ltar mi nus so //
K10D0353_H0361:262a-20: sangs rgyas kyis brnyes pa'i thun mong ni theg pa
K10D0353_H0361:262a-21: gnyis kyis thob pa dang thun mong ba yang yod
K10D0353_H0361:262a-22: / nyan thos kyis thob pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:262a-23: thun mong ma yin pa yang yod do //
K10D0353_H0361:262a-24: theg pa gsum gyis shes pa thun mong ni /
K10D0353_H0361:262a-26: theg pa gnyis kyis shes pa thun mong ni /
K10D0353_H0361:262a-27: sangs rgyas 'ba' zhig gis brnyes te /
K10D0353_H0361:262a-28: theg pa gnyis kyis mi shes pa yang sangs rgyas nyag gcig gis mkhyen to //
K10D0353_H0361:262a-30: ji tsam du sgrom chen kha gab kyang che ste /
K10D0353_H0361:262b-0: chos chen mtshan nyid kyang mtha' @262b yas pas sangs
K10D0353_H0361:262b-1: rgyas ni mtha' yas pa'i ye shes kyis mtha' yas
K10D0353_H0361:262b-3: theg pa gnyis kyi ye shes ni mtha' yod pas chos kyi mtshan nyid ces mi gdags so //
K10D0353_H0361:262b-5: dbang po dang don du ldan te /
K10D0353_H0361:262b-6: dbang po zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o //
K10D0353_H0361:262b-7: don zhes bya ba ni shes rab bo //
K10D0353_H0361:262b-8: dbang po'i don zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyis dmigs pa'i chos so //
K10D0353_H0361:262b-9: sangs rgyas ni dbang po dang /
K10D0353_H0361:262b-11: shes rab kyis dmigs pa'i chos kyang mthar ma phyin pa med do //
K10D0353_H0361:262b-12: theg pa gnyis kyis ni dbang po dang /
K10D0353_H0361:262b-13: don gnyis ka ma rdzogs so //
K10D0353_H0361:262b-15: sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yang
K10D0353_H0361:262b-16: dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa'i yang
K10D0353_H0361:262b-17: dag pa'i ye shes brnyes pa yin no; ;theg pa
K10D0353_H0361:262b-18: gnyis kyis ni chos kyi gting chub par mi shes
K10D0353_H0361:262b-19: pas / yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes bya bar mi rung ste /
K10D0353_H0361:262b-20: de ltar don rnam pa mang po'i sgo nas /
K10D0353_H0361:262b-21: theg pa gnyis la sangs rgyas zhes byar mi rung ngo //
K10D0353_H0361:262b-22: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni tshig dang /
K10D0353_H0361:262b-23: sgra'i sgo nas gdags su mi rung gi /
K10D0353_H0361:262b-24: don gyi sgo nas btags pas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ste /
K10D0353_H0361:262b-25: de yang gnyen po'i chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0353_H0361:262b-27: 'jig rten pa'i sgra skad mi mthun pas 'jig rten pa rang gi mi shes par zad kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-0: sangs rgyas kyis ni kun mkhyen pas @263a *//
K10D0353_H0361:263a-3: dge slong rtsib logs ces bya ba'i gzhung las /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-5: so so'i skye bo dag ni /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-6: kha cig dben zhing zhi ba la dad pa yang yod /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-7: kha cig ni bsam gtan dang /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-8: ting nge 'dzin la dad pa yang yod /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-9: kha cig ni rkyen gzhan gyis gsang mkhyud de mi ston pa yang yod kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-10: sangs rgyas kyis brnyes pa'i chos ni byams pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-12: gzhan la ston cing gsung bar spro'o //
K10D0353_H0361:263a-13: gzhan du na gdug pa gsum bcom pas na /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-16: theg pa gnyis kyang gdug pa gsum bcom na ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das zhes mi gdags /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-18: de lta bu ma yin te /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-19: theg pa gnyis ni phyir ldog pa yod kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-20: sangs rgyas la ni phyir ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0353_H0361:263a-21: phyir ldog pa la yang rnam pa gsum ste /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-23: 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-24: spyod pa'i las phyir ldog pa'o //
K10D0353_H0361:263a-25: 'bras bu phyir ldog ces bya ba ni /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-26: nyan thos kyi 'bras bu gsum phyir ldog pa zad kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-27: 'bras bu tha ma phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-28: theg pa bar ma la rnam pa gnyis te /
K10D0353_H0361:263a-29: gal te bskal pa brgya'i bar du rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rang sangs rgyas ni /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-0: gal te thog ma @263b nas theg pa chung du'i 'bras bu gsum las /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-1: rang sangs rgyas su gyur na /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-2: de'i 'bras bu ni phyir ldog par 'gyur gyi /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-3: sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu ni phyir mi ldog go /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-4: 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa ni /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-5: gal te theg pa gsum la phyogs pa'i gang zag 'bras bu ma thob par phyir ldog pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-6: dge slong rnal 'byor can le lo byed pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-8: rnal 'byor spyod pa la nyams te /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-9: mi brtson pa 'di gsum ni 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:263b-10: spyod pa'i las phyir ldog ces bya ba ni /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-11: ji tsam du thob par bya ba'i chos mngon sum du las su mi rung ba'o //
K10D0353_H0361:263b-13: sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu dang /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-14: theg pa chung du'i ye shes bcu lta bu gcig
K10D0353_H0361:263b-15: la las su byas kyi lhag ma gzhan mi dgos
K10D0353_H0361:263b-16: pa'am / mdo sde'i tshigs su bcad pa 'bum kha ton du shes pa las /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-17: gal te kha ton du ma byas pa'i dus na /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-18: de kun la spyod pa'i las phyir ldog pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:263b-19: theg pa chung du la yang 'bras bu phyir mi ldog pa yod /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-20: theg pa bar ma la yang 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ldog pa yod kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-21: sangs rgyas la ni 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir
K10D0353_H0361:263b-22: ldog pa med do; ;de yang chos thams cad la
K10D0353_H0361:263b-23: brtson 'grus ma byas pa mad pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0353_H0361:263b-24: theg pa gnyis la ni spyod pa las phyir ldog pa yod kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:263b-25: sangs rgyas la ni gcig tu ma nges te /
K10D0353_H0361:264a-1: bcu las gcig las su byas pas chog gi /
K10D0353_H0361:264a-2: dgu las su bya mi dgos pa ldog pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:264a-3: yang gzhan du na las su bya ba la mi dgos pa'i phyir ldog pa med de /
K10D0353_H0361:264a-5: mdo sde'i tshigs su bcad pa khri phrag nyi shu kha ton du 'don shes na /
K10D0353_H0361:264a-6: gang zag ni mthu zhan pas nyin zhag gcig gam /
K10D0353_H0361:264a-7: nyin zhag gnyis kyi bar du rdzogs par 'don nus kyis /
K10D0353_H0361:264a-8: sangs rgyas ni skad cig tsam gyis rdzogs pas stobs bcu yang de dang 'dra ste /
K10D0353_H0361:264a-9: las su bya dgos na skad cig tsam gyis mdzad pa tshad med pas /
K10D0353_H0361:264a-10: las su bya ba la mi dgos pa'i phyir ldog pa med do //
K10D0353_H0361:264a-12: sangs rgyas la las su bya ba la mi dgos pa'i phyir ldog pa med de /
K10D0353_H0361:264a-14: na bza' smad g-yogs gsol ba'i tshe so so'i skye
K10D0353_H0361:264a-15: bo'i chos lta bur gzhung med par gsol ba ni
K10D0353_H0361:264a-16: ma yin te de yang sems can mang po la
K10D0353_H0361:264a-17: phan pa'i don du phrin las ci mdzad kyad phan
K10D0353_H0361:264a-18: pa yod na las de mdzad kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:264a-19: phan pa med na mi mdzad do //
K10D0353_H0361:264a-20: de ltar las su bya ba la mi dgos pa'i phyir ldog pa med kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:264a-21: so so nas dgos pa yod de gcig tu nges
K10D0353_H0361:264a-22: pas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa bsam gyis mi khyab
K10D0353_H0361:264a-24: nyan thos la ci'i slad du 'bras bu gsum ni
K10D0353_H0361:264a-25: phyir ldog la 'bras bu tha ma phyir mi ldog
K10D0353_H0361:264b-1: 'bras bu gsum ni sngon yang thob pas na phyir ldog go /
K10D0353_H0361:264b-2: 'bras bu tha ma ni da dung ma thob pas ni phyir mi ldog go /
K10D0353_H0361:264b-4: gang zag bkren pa zhig kha zas zhim po dang phrad na /
K10D0353_H0361:264b-5: yun ring por mi brjed pa ltar don 'di yang de dang 'dra'o //
K10D0353_H0361:264b-8: bzod pa thogs pa med pa'i lam du 'gyur la
K10D0353_H0361:264b-9: ye shes rnam par grol ba'i lam du 'gyur ro
K10D0353_H0361:264b-10: // 'bras bu gsum ni ye shes thogs pa med pa'i lam du ma gyur la /
K10D0353_H0361:264b-11: ye shes rnam par grol ba'i lam du ma gyur pa'i phyir phyir ldog go /
K10D0353_H0361:264b-13: bden pa mthong ba'i lam ni phyir mi ldog gi /
K10D0353_H0361:264b-14: bsam pa'i lam ni phyir ldog ste /
K10D0353_H0361:264b-16: ma dag pa'i 'du shes kyis nyon mongs pa'i mdud
K10D0353_H0361:264b-17: pa gcad pa'i phyir ro; ;sems pa la ni kun
K10D0353_H0361:264b-18: nas nyon mongs pa yod kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:264b-19: bden pa mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa med de /
K10D0353_H0361:264b-20: bden pa mthong bas kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing /
K10D0353_H0361:264b-21: bden pa mthong bas kun nas nyon mongs pa yang mthong la /
K10D0353_H0361:264b-22: don mthong bas don zab mo sems pa yang skye ste /
K10D0353_H0361:264b-23: kun nas nyon mongs pa phyir mi ldog go /
K10D0353_H0361:264b-25: bden pa mthong ba'i ye shes kyi stobs che ba ni /
K10D0353_H0361:264b-27: sdong po chen pos rdzas mnan pa dang 'dra ste /
K10D0353_H0361:264b-28: sems shing yid la byed pa'i shes rab zhan pas phyir ldog pa yod do //
K10D0353_H0361:265a-0: @265a *// bden pa mthong ba 'dod pa'i khams kyi bzod pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:265a-1: shes rab kyi sems gnyis kyis ni /
K10D0353_H0361:265a-2: dgu pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa gcod do //
K10D0353_H0361:265a-3: khams gong ma'i bzod pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:265a-4: shes rab kyi sems gnyis kyis ni /
K10D0353_H0361:265a-5: kun nas nyon mongs pa bdun cu rtsa gnyis gcod do //
K10D0353_H0361:265a-6: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mthar phyin pas phyir ldog pa med do //

K10D0353_H0361:286a-23: rtsed mo rnam pa sna tshogs yid bzhin du bag
K10D0353_H0361:286a-24: med par byas pa'i 'og tu khrims mnod pa ni

K10D0353_H0361:286b-3: 'og tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de /
K10D0353_H0361:286b-4: khrims mnos na snga dro yang rung /
K10D0353_H0361:286b-6: dus thams cad du khrims thob bo //
K10D0353_H0361:286b-7: khrims mnos par chas pa las bgegs sam /
K10D0353_H0361:286b-9: dbang med pa las phyis bgegs dang /
K10D0353_H0361:286b-10: bar chad med pa'i 'og tu khrims mnos na /
K10D0353_H0361:286b-13: dus thams cad du khrims thob bo //

K10D0353_H0361:286b-19: yan lag brgyad kyi khrims thob par 'gyur ram /
K10D0353_H0361:286b-21: gang yang khrims mi thob bo //

K10D0353_H0361:286b-23: zhag gcig pa'i khrims su bcas te nges pa'i tshad

K10D0353_H0361:287a-2: nyin par sdug bsngal myong ba ngag mthong ngo //

K10D0353_H0361:287a-4: nyin par ni khrims bsrung la /

K10D0353_H0361:287a-6: yang na mtshan mo khrims bsrung la /
K10D0353_H0361:287a-7: nyin par sdig pa'i las bgyid pa mi mthun pa'i don de dag ji lta bu lags /
K10D0353_H0361:287a-9: skye ba snga ma'i rgyu dang /

K10D0353_H0361:287b-11: shing rta khrid de song ngo //
