K10D0353_H0361:301b-20: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i sems can grangs med pa dran par byed do //
K10D0353_H0361:301b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' drin lci ba bsab pa'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:301b-22: byang chub sems dpa' ni mdo sde bcu gnyis tshol ba la brtsod par byed do //
K10D0353_H0361:301b-23: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus su sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba ni /
K10D0353_H0361:302a-1: thams cad dad pa'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:302a-2: rgyu'i rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do //
K10D0353_H0361:302a-4: nyes pa'i skyon thams cad shes par bya ba dang;
K10D0353_H0361:302a-5: mu steg can gyi ngan par lta ba'i gtsug lag
K10D0353_H0361:302a-7: sems can gdul ba'i thabs mkhas pa shes par bya ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:302a-8: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i don dang /
K10D0353_H0361:302a-9: 'jig rten pa'i tshig gi don rnam par dbye bar bya ba'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:302a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rgyu'i rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do //
K10D0353_H0361:302a-11: byang chub sems dpa' ci'i phyir sgra'i rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed ce na /
K10D0353_H0361:302a-12: sgra'i tshig yongs su dag par brgyan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:302a-13: yongs su ma dag pa'i tshig gis don gsal bar ston mi nus pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:302a-14: don thams cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:302a-15: yang dag pa'i tshig mi nyams pas nga rgyal gyis mi shigs pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:302a-16: ngan par lta ba las bzlog cing sems can gdul ba'i thabs mkhas par shes par bya ba'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:302a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sgra'i rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do //
K10D0353_H0361:302a-18: byang chub sems dpa' ci'i phyir sman dpyad kyi rig pa'i bstan bcos slob ce na /
K10D0353_H0361:302a-19: sems can rnams mi dge ba'i nad brgya rtsa bzhi dang dbral bar bya ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:302a-20: sems can thams cad la byams shing snying brtse pa'i
K10D0353_H0361:302b-0: phyir sems can rnams dad pa'i sems bskyed @302b bar
K10D0353_H0361:302b-1: bya ba dang / de ltar nad dang bral bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar bya ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:302b-2: de ltar dga' ba'i sems skyes pas rtag tu sangs rgyas dran par 'gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:302b-3: snying rje chen pos sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin par bya ba'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:302b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sman dpyad kyi rig pa'i bstan bcos slob par byed do //
K10D0353_H0361:302b-5: byang chub sems dpa' ni ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi bzo'i rig pa slob par byed ce na /
K10D0353_H0361:302b-6: sems can la phan par bya ba'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:302b-7: nor zang zing rnyed sla bas sems can rnams dad pa bskyed par bya ba rnams dang /
K10D0353_H0361:302b-8: 'jig rten gyi bya ba'i dngos po kun shes pas nga rgyal gzhom pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:302b-9: sems can gdul bar bya ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:302b-10: srid pa'i chos thams cad kyis bsgribs pa kun bsal ba'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:302b-11: byang chub sems dpa' bzo'i rig pa slob par byed do //
K10D0353_H0361:302b-12: gal te byang chub sems dpa' rig pa'i dngos po lnga sngar ma bslabs na /
K10D0353_H0361:302b-13: nam du yang bla na med pa yang dag par
K10D0353_H0361:302b-14: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
K10D0353_H0361:302b-15: shes thob par mi nus so //
K10D0353_H0361:302b-16: de bas na bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:302b-17: rig pa'i dngos po lnga bslab par bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:302b-18: byang chub sems dpa' ni drin shes pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:302b-19: drin lan bsab pa ni sems can la bshad pa'i dngos po bshad cing bstan par bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:303a-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @303a *//
K10D0353_H0361:303a-2: rig pa lnga dang ldan par bshad par bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:303a-3: bshad pa la rnam gnyis te /
K10D0353_H0361:303a-5: yongs su dag par bshad pa'o //
K10D0353_H0361:303a-6: de la ji ltar na rim gyis bshad pa gang zhe na /
K10D0353_H0361:303a-7: sngar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bshad la /
K10D0353_H0361:303a-8: de'i 'og tu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nas /
K10D0353_H0361:303a-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du bshad pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:303a-12: don yid la byed cing chos bzhin du gnas pa
K10D0353_H0361:303a-13: ni rim gyis bshad pa zhes bya'o; ;de la yongs
K10D0353_H0361:303a-14: su dag par bshad pa zhes bya ba ni gang
K10D0353_H0361:303a-15: zhe na / nyan pa 'dug la bshad pa 'greng na /
K10D0353_H0361:303a-16: de la bshad par mi bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:303a-17: gal te nyan pa chos la skyon tshol lam /
K10D0353_H0361:303a-18: bshad pa la skyon tshol na de la bshad par mi bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:303a-19: gal te nyan pa gang zag la rten gyi /
K10D0353_H0361:303a-21: chos la mi rten pas de la bshad par mi bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:303a-22: gal te nyan pa yi ge la rten la /
K10D0353_H0361:303a-23: don la mi rten na bshad par mi bya ba nas /
K10D0353_H0361:303a-24: bkri ba'i don la rten gyi /
K10D0353_H0361:303a-25: nges pa'i don gyi bar la mi rten na bshad par mi bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:303a-27: gang zag de ni sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0353_H0361:303a-28: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su dag pa'i chos la ma gus pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0353_H0361:303b-0: gal te bshad cing ston pa yang chos la bkur sti @303b byed la /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-1: chos nyan pa gang gus pa'i sems kyis rtse gcig
K10D0353_H0361:303b-2: tu nyan cing nga rgyal gyi sems med pa ni
K10D0353_H0361:303b-3: / yongs su dag par bshad pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:303b-5: rim gyis bshad pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad bshad pa'o //
K10D0353_H0361:303b-6: thams cad bshad pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-7: mdo sde bcu gnyis nas tshig gcig gam /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-8: tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-9: tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi bar du bshad pa ste /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-10: de yang tshig gi sgra dang /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-14: don bstan pa yang spro ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-16: dga' bar bya ba'i phyir dus su bstan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-17: dus kha cig tu gshe zhing spyo ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-18: dus kha cig tu drang por thad kar bstan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-19: dus kha cig tu dpe rnams bstan te /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-20: ci dang 'phrod pa bzhin du bstan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-21: dus kha cig tu de bas nye zhing slab par bstan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-22: dus kha cig tu ci ltar mos pa bzhin du 'jug sla ba bstan pa na /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-23: byang chub sems dpa'i drin shes pa /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-24: drin bsab pa la mkhas pa'i mchog chos rim gyis bshad pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:303b-26: yongs su dag par bshad pa zhes bya ba ni /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-27: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgra sdang pa la byams pa'i sems bsgom ste /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-28: byams pa'i sems kyis sems can sdig pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:303b-29: gang zag bag med pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:304a-1: nas chos bstan nas rgyags shing dregs pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:304a-2: gang zag dbul phongs pa'i bar du thabs rnam pa mang pos chos ston par byed kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:304a-8: grags pa'i phyir ma yin pa ni /
K10D0353_H0361:304a-9: byang chub sems dpa' drin shes shing drin bsab pa
K10D0353_H0361:304a-10: la mkhas pa'i chos yongs su dag par bshad pa
K10D0353_H0361:304a-11: zhes bya'o // de la ji ltar na chos bzhin du gnas pa yin zhe na /
K10D0353_H0361:304a-14: yid kyi las dge ba'i chos sgom zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan te drin shes pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:304a-15: drin bsab pa yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bstan pa'o //
K10D0353_H0361:304a-17: byang chub sems dpa' chen po drin shes shing /
K10D0353_H0361:304a-18: drin bsab pa ni don yid la byed de /
K10D0353_H0361:304a-19: mang du thos pas gzungs thob par byed cing chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:304a-20: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:304a-21: bde ba'i don du sbyin pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:304a-23: mang du thos pa la brtson par bya /
K10D0353_H0361:304a-24: chos ston cing 'chad pa la mchod pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:304a-25: rim gro bya yi chos la skyon mi gdags /
K10D0353_H0361:304a-26: ston cing 'chad pa la skyon mi gdags /
K10D0353_H0361:304a-28: 'tshe ba med pa'i sems kyis sems can la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ni /
K10D0353_H0361:304b-2: mi'i longs spyod myong zhing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam thob pa ni drin shes pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:304b-6: dngos po bzhis bzod pa bsgom zhing mi bzod pa yongs su spangs te /
K10D0353_H0361:304b-7: byang chub brgyan pa'i phyir sems can mang po bsdus nas bzod pa bsgom pa la bkod de /
K10D0353_H0361:304b-8: bdag kyang bzod pa byed de /
K10D0353_H0361:304b-9: gzhan yang bzod pa byed pa la 'god cing /
K10D0353_H0361:304b-10: 'jigs pa dang bral ba ni drin shes pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:304b-11: de ltar bzod pa byas pa'i rkyen gyis zhe sdang gi sems mi 'byung bas /
K10D0353_H0361:304b-12: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan /
K10D0353_H0361:304b-14: nyon mongs pa mi 'byung bas 'gyod pa'i sems med de /
K10D0353_H0361:304b-15: lus 'di dang bral nas kyang lha dang /
K10D0353_H0361:304b-16: mi'i longs spyod mya ngan las 'da' ba thob pa ni drin bsab pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:304b-18: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dngos po rnam pa bzhis brtson 'grus rtsom ste /
K10D0353_H0361:304b-19: le lo yongs su spangs nas byang chub brgyan pa'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:304b-20: sems can yongs su sdud do //
K10D0353_H0361:304b-21: byang chub kyi lam gyi phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pas nyal na yang bde la /
K10D0353_H0361:304b-23: nyon mongs pa dang bral bas bde ba'i chos skye zhing 'phel te /
K10D0353_H0361:304b-24: lus kyi bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba ni bdag la phan pa'i don byed pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:304b-25: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom yang /
K10D0353_H0361:305a-3: gzhan la phan pa'i don byed pa zhes bya ste /
K10D0353_H0361:305a-4: lus 'di dang bral nas kyang lha dang /
K10D0353_H0361:305a-5: mi'i longs spyod myong zhing mthu dang dbang du ldan te /
K10D0353_H0361:305a-6: byang chub kyi lam thob pas 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:305a-7: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i
K10D0353_H0361:305a-8: dngos po bzhi zhes bya'o; ;byang chub sems dpa'i ting
K10D0353_H0361:305a-9: nge 'dzin bsgoms pas 'khrug pa'i sems yongs su spangs
K10D0353_H0361:305a-10: te / byang chub brgyan pa'i phyir sems can yongs su sdud do //
K10D0353_H0361:305a-11: byang chub kyi lam gyi phyir ting nge 'dzin bsgoms
K10D0353_H0361:305a-12: pas tshe 'di yang 'jig rten gyi bde ba myong
K10D0353_H0361:305a-14: sems dben zhing zhi ba ni drin lan shes pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:305a-16: sems dben zhing zhi pas sems can la mi 'tshe ba ni drin bsab pa zhes bya ste /
K10D0353_H0361:305a-17: byang chub sems dpa' lus 'di dang bral nas /
K10D0353_H0361:305a-18: rnam par dag pa'i lus thob cing bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i longs spyod myong ste /
K10D0353_H0361:305a-19: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba thob pa ni /
K10D0353_H0361:305a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan sgom pa'i dngos po bzhi zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:305a-22: byang chub sems dpa' drin shes pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:305a-23: drin bsab pa ni shes rab dang ldan pas ma rig pa bcom ste /
K10D0353_H0361:305a-24: byang chub yongs su brgyan pa'i phyir bsdu ba'i chos
K10D0353_H0361:305b-0: rnam pa bzhis @305b sems can yongs su sdud do
K10D0353_H0361:305b-1: // byang chub kyi phyir shes rab bsgoms pas chos kyi dbyings shes shing rtog pa'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:305b-2: lus kyis bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba ni /
K10D0353_H0361:305b-3: bdag la phan pa'i don zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:305b-4: sems can rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi don dang /
K10D0353_H0361:305b-5: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don bskyed pa ni gzhan la phan pa'i don zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:305b-7: shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis yongs su spangs pas na /
K10D0353_H0361:305b-8: 'bras bu chen po zhes bya ste /
K10D0353_H0361:305b-10: drin bsab pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyis
K10D0353_H0361:305b-11: dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa bzhi zhes bya'o
K10D0353_H0361:305b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes pas /
K10D0353_H0361:305b-14: sngon 'das pa'i dngos po shes rab kyis rtogs te /
K10D0353_H0361:305b-15: sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:305b-17: dge ba'i ris su mthun pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:305b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas
K10D0353_H0361:305b-20: pas dga' ldan gnam du tshe phun sum tshogs par
K10D0353_H0361:305b-21: skyes so // de nas mchog tu gyur pa gsum dang ldan te /
K10D0353_H0361:305b-22: tshe mchog tu gyur pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:305b-23: gzugs mchog tu gyur pa dang; grags pa mchog tu gyur pa'o //
K10D0353_H0361:305b-24: thog ma gnas de nas babs pa'i tshe 'od zer chen po bkye nas /
K10D0353_H0361:305b-25: phyogs bcu snang bar byas te /
K10D0353_H0361:305b-26: yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:306a-2: lhums nas bltams pa'i dus mkhyen to //
K10D0353_H0361:306a-3: phyogs bcur phyogs re rer yang mis ma brten par gom pa bdun bdun por te /
K10D0353_H0361:306a-5: bdag gi da ltar gyi lus 'di ni lus nang gi tha ma ste /
K10D0353_H0361:306a-13: lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis me tog dang /
K10D0353_H0361:306a-18: gdugs dam pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas so; ;skyes
K10D0353_H0361:306a-19: bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan
K10D0353_H0361:306a-20: pas / de'i lus las mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med do //
K10D0353_H0361:306a-21: byams pa'i shugs kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom mo //
K10D0353_H0361:306a-22: lhu tshigs re re la yang gyad mthu bo che'i stobs re re dang ldan no //
K10D0353_H0361:306a-23: gzhon nu bus pa'i tshe 'jig rten gyi dngos po
K10D0353_H0361:306a-24: ma bslabs par thams cad kun rtogs shing shes so
K10D0353_H0361:306a-25: // ston pa med par rang btsal te /
K10D0353_H0361:306a-26: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lhun gyis grub bo //
K10D0353_H0361:306a-27: tshangs pa'i lha'i dbang bos bskul nas sems can rnams la chos kyis 'khor lo bskor to //
K10D0353_H0361:306a-28: ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pas 'brug sgra bsgrags kyang ma g-yos so //
K10D0353_H0361:306b-0: gcan gzan rnams nye bar bsten te pha ma @306b bzhin du sdug par bsams so //
K10D0353_H0361:306b-1: byol song gi bsod snyoms phul ba yang sangs rgyas kyis de'i bsams pa mkhyen to //
K10D0353_H0361:306b-5: shing ljon pa'i yal ga yang de'i phyogs su btud de grib ma'i skyabs byas /
K10D0353_H0361:306b-6: mngon par sangs rgyas nas kyang /
K10D0353_H0361:306b-7: lo drug gi bar du bdud ma rungs pa /
K10D0353_H0361:306b-8: rgyun du glags btsal kyang glags ma rnyed do //
K10D0353_H0361:306b-9: rgyun du ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pas /
K10D0353_H0361:306b-10: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sems yongs su rdzogs te /
K10D0353_H0361:306b-11: rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:306b-12: 'gag pa la shin tu mkhas pas /
K10D0353_H0361:306b-13: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba thun mong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:306b-14: skye ba thun mong ma yin pa ni sems can la phan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:306b-17: gang zag smyos pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
K10D0353_H0361:306b-18: ba'i rkyen gyis sngon gyi sems sor chud pa dang
K10D0353_H0361:306b-19: / dmus long gis mthong bar 'gyur ba'am /
K10D0353_H0361:306b-20: mngal mgo log tu gyur pa legs par btsas pa'am /
K10D0353_H0361:306b-21: 'on pa rna bas thos par gyur pa'am /
K10D0353_H0361:306b-24: gti mug can dug gsum byang bar gyur pa de
K10D0353_H0361:306b-25: lta bu ni skye ba thun mong ma yin pa
K10D0353_H0361:306b-26: bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:306b-28: skye ba thun mong zhes bya ba ni de bzhin
K10D0353_H0361:306b-29: gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste
K10D0353_H0361:307a-0: / rtag tu glo g-yas pa phab nas gzim @307a *//
K10D0353_H0361:307a-2: seng ge'i rgyal po lta bur rtsva 'jag ma ltar mi 'grug pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-3: rlung gi rgyal po bhee ram pas kyang na bza'i mtha' tsam mi g-yo ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-4: gshegs pa'i gom stabs ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge'am /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-5: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar gshegs pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-6: gshegs su 'cha' ba na zhabs g-yas pa sngar 'dor ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-8: gang du gshegs kyang sa gzhi mthon dma' mnyam pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-9: bsod snyoms la dri nga ba'i skyon med cing zhal
K10D0353_H0361:307a-10: nas phyir ma 'brul ba ni skye ba thun mong
K10D0353_H0361:307a-11: ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:307a-13: skye ba thun mong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-15: zhabs kyi mthil mnyam zhing gang ba yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-16: zhabs kyi mthil na 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa yod pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-17: phyag sor phra la ring ba yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-18: zhabs kyi rting pa zlum la gang ba yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-19: phyag sor gyi bar dra bas 'brel ba yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-22: zhabs kyi byin pa ri dvags kyi rgyal po ae
K10D0353_H0361:307a-23: na ya ltar zlum la shugs kyis gzhol ba yin
K10D0353_H0361:307a-24: / zhabs kyi long bu phyir mi snang ba yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-25: phyag pus mor slebs pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-26: rta'i rgyal po ltar mtshan spubs kyi nang du mi snang ba yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-27: shing n+ya gro dha ltar sku'i yan lag yongs su rdzogs pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307a-28: sku'i ba sbu gyen du nyal ba yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-0: ba sbu re @307b re nas g-yas su 'khyil ba yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-1: sku mdog gser btso ma ltar 'dug pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-2: rtag pa'i 'od 'dom gang dang ldan pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-3: lpags pa mnyen zhing 'jam la rdul dang /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-4: dri mas mi gos pa yin; gnas bdun yongs su gang ba yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-5: sku'i stod seng ge ltar 'dug pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-6: phyag gi lag ngar zlum la shugs kyis gzhol ba yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-7: sgrog rus mnyam par gang ba yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-8: sku'i stod smad 'byes pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-9: zhal gyi tshems bzhi bcu dang ldan pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-10: tshems kyi thags bzang zhing mnyam pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-12: 'gram pa ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge ltar gang ba yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-13: ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-14: sha'i do ker gyi mtshan dang ldan pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-15: ljags ring la yangs pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-16: tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:307b-17: spyan gyi mdog mthon mthing ltar 'dug pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-18: spyan khyu mchog gi rgyal po ltar 'dug pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-19: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dkar po dang ldan pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-20: de bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan te /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-21: dpe byad bzang po re re la yang dpe byad
K10D0353_H0361:307b-22: bzang po'i mchog dam pa brgya stong snyed yod de
K10D0353_H0361:307b-23: / dpe byad bzang po de dag re re la
K10D0353_H0361:307b-24: yang byang chub sems dpa' thog ma byang chub tu
K10D0353_H0361:307b-25: / sems bskyed nas / byang chub la ni shin tu brtan pas /
K10D0353_H0361:307b-26: drin shes shing drin bsab pa'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:308a-0: spyod pa dam pa de dag spyad de de bas na bla na med @308a *//
K10D0353_H0361:308a-1: pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0353_H0361:308a-2: sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0353_H0361:308a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon yun ring po bskal pa grangs med /
K10D0353_H0361:308a-5: tshul khrims yongs su dag par bsrungs pas /
K10D0353_H0361:308a-6: zhabs kyi mthil mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:308a-10: gang zag yon tan dang ldan pa la mchod pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:308a-11: bkur stir byas pa'i rkyen gyis zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:308a-12: sems can rnams la mi 'tshe zhing 'phrog pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:308a-17: yon tan dang ldan pa'i gang zag la rgyang ma nas bsu bskyel byas shing /
K10D0353_H0361:308a-18: khri stan bting la nga rgyal spangs te rim gro dang /
K10D0353_H0361:308a-21: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sor mo phra zhing ring
K10D0353_H0361:308a-22: bar gyur pa'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin
K10D0353_H0361:308a-23: no // gong du smos pa'i bya ba gsum dang ldan pas /
K10D0353_H0361:308a-24: rting pa zlum la gang pa'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:308a-25: bsdu ba'i chos rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba mang po yongs su bsdus pas /
K10D0353_H0361:308a-26: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sor mo'i bar dra bas
K10D0353_H0361:308a-27: 'brel ba'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur ba yin no
K10D0353_H0361:308b-0: yon tan dang ldan pa'i gang zag gi lus la @308b bskus shing mnyes pas /
K10D0353_H0361:308b-1: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis rkang lag mnyan zhing ring la 'jam pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:308b-2: dge ba'i chos bsgom pa la mi skyo bas /
K10D0353_H0361:308b-3: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis thal gong mnyam la lag par zlum zhing shugs kyis gzhol ba yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:308b-4: chos thos par dga' zhing gzhan la chos ston par yang mos te /
K10D0353_H0361:308b-5: chos kyi phyir mngag gzhug gi las byas pas /
K10D0353_H0361:308b-6: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis long bu'i rus pa mi snang ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:308b-7: sgo gsum yongs su dag cing nad g-yog dang /
K10D0353_H0361:308b-8: sman gyi sbyin pa byin te /
K10D0353_H0361:308b-9: nga rgyal med la bza' ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:308b-10: btung ba la chog shes pa'i rgyu dang /
K10D0353_H0361:308b-11: rkyen gyis lus drang por 'greng na lag pas bus mor slebs pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:308b-12: 'khon gcugs su gyur pa la tshig 'jam pos bsdums te /
K10D0353_H0361:308b-13: bdag kyang ngo tsha ba dang ldan pa'i chos spyad de; gzhan yang spyod du bcug na /
K10D0353_H0361:308b-14: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis rta'i rgyal po ltar mtshan sbubs kyi nang du nub pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:308b-15: bdag gi sgo gsum yongs su dag la /
K10D0353_H0361:308b-16: gzhan yang yongs su dag par byed cing sems can
K10D0353_H0361:308b-17: dag 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'khrugs te nad du
K10D0353_H0361:308b-18: gyur pa'i sman dpyad kyis gsos pas na /
K10D0353_H0361:308b-19: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus kyi mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:308b-20: chos thos par dga' zhing gzhan la chos ston par mos pas na /
K10D0353_H0361:308b-21: lus kyi ba spu gyen [?] du nyal ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin /
K10D0353_H0361:308b-22: chos kyi don zab mo yid la bgyid cing dge ba'i chos sgom par mos la /
K10D0353_H0361:309a-4: yon tan dang ldan pas gang zag la mchod pa byas pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:309a-5: sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten dang /
K10D0353_H0361:309a-7: lam srang na 'dug pa'i bong ba'am /
K10D0353_H0361:309a-10: mi gtsang ba med par byas na /
K10D0353_H0361:309a-11: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis spu re re nas g-yas
K10D0353_H0361:309a-12: phyogs su 'khyil ba'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa
K10D0353_H0361:309a-13: yin no // pha rol po gzhan dag la zas dang /
K10D0353_H0361:309a-16: de la sogs pa byin zhing zhe sdang gi sems med pas na /
K10D0353_H0361:309a-17: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis gser btso ma'i mdog dang ldan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:309a-18: 'od rtag pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:309a-19: ci'i las kyis ba spu'i khung bu re re nas
K10D0353_H0361:309a-20: spu re re skyes pa'i mtshan dang ldan zhe na
K10D0353_H0361:309a-21: / las de nyid kyi rgyu las gyur te /
K10D0353_H0361:309a-22: las kyi rgyu de nyid kyis lus mnyan zhing 'jam la /
K10D0353_H0361:309a-24: dri mas mi gos pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:309a-25: sems can dag la dgos pa'i zang zing rgyun du gtong bas na /
K10D0353_H0361:309a-26: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis gnas bdun mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:309a-29: rang bzhin gyis mnyen zhing des pa'i sems kyis /
K10D0353_H0361:309a-30: sems can gyi yid dang sbyor te chos bzhin du spyod la /
K10D0353_H0361:309a-31: mi dge ba'i chos spangs pa'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:309b-0: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis ro stod ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge lta bu'i @309b mtshan dang /
K10D0353_H0361:309b-2: sgrog rus mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan dang /
K10D0353_H0361:309b-3: sor mo ring ba'i mtshan dang /
K10D0353_H0361:309b-4: lus kyi mtha' yang zhing 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:309b-5: phra ma yongs su spangs te rtsod cing 'khon pa'i bsdums byas pas /
K10D0353_H0361:309b-6: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis so bzhi bcu dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang /
K10D0353_H0361:309b-7: so'i thags bzang ba'i mtshan dang /
K10D0353_H0361:309b-8: so mnyam pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:309b-9: 'dod pa'i khams kyi byams pa bsgoms pas /
K10D0353_H0361:309b-10: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis so dkar ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:309b-11: slong ba mthong na dga' ba'i sems kyis bsu bskyal byas pas /
K10D0353_H0361:309b-12: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:309b-13: sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du 'dra bar lta bas /
K10D0353_H0361:309b-14: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis ro bro ba'i mchog gi mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:309b-15: sems can la bla na med pa'i chos kyi ro
K10D0353_H0361:309b-16: rtag tu gtong zhing brjed cing mi dran pa la
K10D0353_H0361:309b-18: bdag kyang tshul khrims lnga srung la /
K10D0353_H0361:309b-19: gzhan yang bsrung bar bskul zhing byams pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa chen po byas na /
K10D0353_H0361:309b-20: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sha'i gtsug tor gyi mtshan dang /
K10D0353_H0361:309b-21: lce ring zhing yangs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:309b-23: chos kyi dga' ba'i tshig dang /
K10D0353_H0361:309b-24: mnyen des pa'i tshig smra yi dus ma yin pa'i tshig mi smra bas /
K10D0353_H0361:310a-0: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis tshangs pa'i sgrangs dbyangs dang ldan pa yin @310a *//
K10D0353_H0361:310a-1: no; ;snying rje'i sems bsgoms pas sems can rnams la
K10D0353_H0361:310a-2: pha ma lta bur lta bas de'i rgyu de'i rkyen
K10D0353_H0361:310a-3: gyis mig mthon mthing ltar 'dug pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:310a-4: mig khyu mchog gi rgyal po lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:310a-5: yon tan dang ldan pa'i legs pa ma bcabs shing bstod cing bsngags pas /
K10D0353_H0361:310a-6: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis mdzod spu dkar po'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:310a-7: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'di dag gi rgyu dang /
K10D0353_H0361:310a-8: rkyen so sor bshad mod kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:310a-9: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen yang dag pa ni tshul khrims dang /
K10D0353_H0361:310a-12: gal te tshul khrims ma bsrungs /
K10D0353_H0361:310a-14: mi'i lus kyang thob par mi nus na /
K10D0353_H0361:310a-15: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10D0353_H0361:310a-16: spyi gtsug bltar mi snang ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:310a-17: sha'i gtsug tor gyi mtshan gnyis la tha dad pa med do //
K10D0353_H0361:310a-18: gzhan yang ci byed do cog la gcig tu ma nges te /
K10D0353_H0361:310a-20: de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis rkang mthil mnyam par gang ba'i mtshan 'thob bo //
K10D0353_H0361:310a-21: de yang sems rtse gcig tu byas na /
K10D0353_H0361:310a-22: de'i rgyus 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang /
K10D0353_H0361:310a-26: gnas bdun mnyam par gang ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:310b-0: lce @310b ring zhing yangs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0353_H0361:310b-1: de yang bya ba rtag tu byas na /
K10D0353_H0361:310b-2: de'i rgyus sor mo ring ba'i mtshan dang /
K10D0353_H0361:310b-3: lag pas pus mor slebs pa'i mtshan dang /
K10D0353_H0361:310b-4: 'od nag pa 'dom gang gi mtshan dang /
K10D0353_H0361:310b-5: so thags bzang zhing ya yo med pa'i mtshan thob bo //
K10D0353_H0361:310b-6: bya ba yongs su dag par byas na /
K10D0353_H0361:310b-7: de'i rgyus mtshan lhag ma gzhan rnams thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0353_H0361:310b-9: sems can dag la dge ba 'ba' zhig gi sems
K10D0353_H0361:310b-10: bskyed pas de'i rgyus rkang lag mnyen zhing 'jam pa
K10D0353_H0361:310b-11: dang / lpags pa mnyen zhing 'jam la rdul dang /
K10D0353_H0361:310b-12: dri mas mi gos pa'i mtshan thob bo //
K10D0353_H0361:310b-13: rim gyis bsgom zhing spyod pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:310b-14: dus bzhin du bsgom shing spyod pas /
K10D0353_H0361:310b-18: dge ba'i chos bsgom pa la mos shing 'gyod pa'i
K10D0353_H0361:310b-19: sems med pas de'i rgyus lus kyi mdog gser lta
K10D0353_H0361:310b-22: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i mtshan thob bo //
K10D0353_H0361:310b-23: bstod cing bsngags na yang nga rgyal mi skye la /
K10D0353_H0361:310b-24: bdag gi legs pa bcabs te rlom sems med na /
K10D0353_H0361:310b-25: de'i rgyus rta lta bur mtshan spubs su nub pa'i mtshan thob bo //
K10D0353_H0361:310b-26: dge ba'i las ci byas pa byang chub tu bsngos na /
K10D0353_H0361:310b-27: de'i rgyus ba spu khung re re nas spu re re skye pa'i mtshan dang /
K10D0353_H0361:310b-28: ba spu gyen du nyal ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:310b-29: so bzhi bcu dang ldan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:311a-2: rtag tu brtson 'grus byas na de'i rgyus 'gram pa'i lha nga zlum pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:311a-3: lus kyi stod seng ge lta bu'i mtshan thob bo //
K10D0353_H0361:311a-4: sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar sdug par bsams pas /
K10D0353_H0361:311a-5: de'i rgyus so thags bzang zhing mnyam pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:311a-6: mig mthon mthing du 'dug pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:311a-7: mig khyu mchog gi rgyal po lta bu'i mtshan thob bo //
K10D0353_H0361:311a-8: dge ba'i chos sgrub pa la skyo zhing ngal ba'i sems med pas /
K10D0353_H0361:311a-9: mtshan lhag ma gzhan rnams thob bo //
K10D0353_H0361:311a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe /
K10D0353_H0361:311a-11: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi las byed do //
K10D0353_H0361:311a-12: rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'i tshe /
K10D0353_H0361:311a-13: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod mod kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:311a-16: spyod pa bcu gsum pa la gnas pa na /
K10D0353_H0361:311a-18: gsal bar yongs su rdzogs so //
K10D0353_H0361:311a-19: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis mtshan grangs med mod kyi /
K10D0353_H0361:311a-20: sems can rnams la mi mthun te rab dang /
K10D0353_H0361:311a-22: tha ma yod pas bsam gyis mi khyab pas /
K10D0353_H0361:311a-23: de bas na sangs rgyas kyis mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis gsungs so //
K10D0353_H0361:311a-24: sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams ji tsam yod pa phyogs gcig tu bsdus te spungs na /
K10D0353_H0361:311b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu gcig gi mtshan @311b dang mnyam mo //
K10D0353_H0361:311b-1: ba spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi bsod nams ji
K10D0353_H0361:311b-2: snyed gcig yod pa gcig tu bsdus te spungs na
K10D0353_H0361:311b-3: / dpe byad bzang po gcig dang mnyam mo //
K10D0353_H0361:311b-4: dpe byad bzang po ji tsam yod pa'i bsod nams
K10D0353_H0361:311b-5: ji snyed yod pa de las brgya 'gyur du byas
K10D0353_H0361:311b-6: na / mtshan gcig dang mnyam ste /
K10D0353_H0361:311b-7: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dkar po'i mtshan dang /
K10D0353_H0361:311b-8: spyi gtsug mtshan bltar mi snang ba'i mtshan ni ma gtogs so //
K10D0353_H0361:311b-9: de ma yin pa mtshan gzhan thams cad gcig tu bsdus te stong 'gyur du byas na /
K10D0353_H0361:311b-10: mtshan gong ma gnyis su 'gyur ro //
K10D0353_H0361:311b-11: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang; dpe byad bzang po
K10D0353_H0361:311b-12: brgyad cu po'i bsod nams ji snyed yod pa gcig
K10D0353_H0361:311b-13: tu bsdus spungs te khri phrag stong 'gyur du byas
K10D0353_H0361:311b-14: pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'brug sgra lta
K10D0353_H0361:311b-15: bu'i dbyangs zab cing rgyang ring por grags pa'i mtshan
K10D0353_H0361:311b-16: pa dang / dang mnyam ste / gsung sgra de
K10D0353_H0361:311b-17: nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med mtha' yas bsam
K10D0353_H0361:311b-18: gyis mi khyab pa'i rdul phra rab snyed du grags
K10D0353_H0361:311b-19: shing sems can gyi don du byams pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:311b-20: snying rje chen po spyod pas /
K10D0353_H0361:311b-22: drin bsab pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K10D0353_H0361:311b-24: dpe byad bzang po de dag re res kyang /
K10D0353_H0361:311b-25: so so'i skye bo tshad med grangs med pa bya
K10D0353_H0361:311b-26: ba brgya stong gis chen po'i rdul phra rab snyed
K10D0353_H0361:311b-28: bde ba'i don byas nas byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go /
K10D0353_H0361:312a-3: dpe byad bzang po rnam pa gnyis thob ste /
K10D0353_H0361:312a-5: dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub kyi shing drung du song ste /
K10D0353_H0361:312a-6: bdud kyi dpung rnams btul te mngon par sangs rgyas nas /
K10D0353_H0361:312a-7: yang dag par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to //
K10D0353_H0361:312a-8: so so'i skye bo la phan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:312a-9: bde ba'i don du 'dod pa'i chu klung las bsgral nas /
K10D0353_H0361:312a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gram du bkod de /
K10D0353_H0361:312a-11: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:312a-12: bde ba'i don yongs su rdzogs par byas so //
K10D0353_H0361:312a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' po dang /
K10D0353_H0361:312a-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sogs te /
K10D0353_H0361:312a-15: 'khor mang po thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0353_H0361:312a-17: khyed rnams la su zhig sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin
K10D0353_H0361:312a-18: rtag tu gzo zhing dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir
K10D0353_H0361:312a-19: / thabs mkhas pa chen po drin lan bsab pa'i mdo sde shin tu zab mo 'di /
K10D0353_H0361:312a-20: glegs bam du bri ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:312a-23: su zhig gis phyi ma'i dus ngan pa'i tshe /
K10D0353_H0361:312a-25: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i pa'i
K10D0353_H0361:312a-26: byang chub 'di srung zhing gzungs su 'dzin par 'gyur
K10D0353_H0361:312a-27: / su zhig gis chos bsrung ba'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:312a-28: mdo sde 'di rgyas par sbel zhing sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:312b-0: bde ba'i @312b don byed par nus zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0353_H0361:312b-1: de'i tshe 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0353_H0361:312b-2: sems dpa' chen po khri brgya stong snyed 'dug pa
K10D0353_H0361:312b-3: las langs te / gos tshags bcos nas bla gos
K10D0353_H0361:312b-4: phyogs gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha
K10D0353_H0361:312b-6: thal mo sbyar ba btud nas sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:312b-8: bdag cag gis slad ma'i dus ngan pa'i tshe /
K10D0353_H0361:312b-9: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0353_H0361:312b-10: chub 'di bsrung zhing dam pa'i chos gzungs su bzung
K10D0353_H0361:312b-11: ste / sems can mang po la phan pa'i don byed par spro'o //
K10D0353_H0361:312b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ges 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0353_H0361:312b-14: bdag kyang thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams yongs su bsdu bar spro'o //
K10D0353_H0361:312b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes gsol pa /
K10D0353_H0361:312b-16: sems can gang ngan 'gro gsum du ltung bar gyur
K10D0353_H0361:312b-17: pa dag bdag gis ci nas kyang mi ltung bar
K10D0353_H0361:312b-18: bgyi bar spro'o // byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa; sems can rnams ci dang /
K10D0353_H0361:312b-19: ci 'dod pa bdag gis thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar spro'o //
K10D0353_H0361:312b-20: byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa /
K10D0353_H0361:312b-21: bdag gis ni sems can rnams la ye shes chen
K10D0353_H0361:312b-22: po'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan sbyin par bgyi bar spro'o
K10D0353_H0361:312b-23: // byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa /
K10D0353_H0361:313a-1: gis ni sems can rnams la chos yongs su sbyin par spro'o //
K10D0353_H0361:313a-2: byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od kyis gsol pa /
K10D0353_H0361:313a-4: bdag gis ni sems can rnams la bde ba sbyin par spro'o //
K10D0353_H0361:313a-5: byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od kyis gsol pa /
K10D0353_H0361:313a-7: bdag gis ni sems can rnams la bsod nams kyi las byed du gzhug par bskul bar spro'o //
K10D0353_H0361:313a-8: byang chub sems dpa' dge sbyong gis gsol pa /
K10D0353_H0361:313a-10: bdag ni sems can rnams la thams cad bag med pa la mi gnas par bskul bar spro'o //
K10D0353_H0361:313a-11: byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas gsol pa /
K10D0353_H0361:313a-13: bdag ni sems can thams cad la zad mi shes pa'i dbyings kyi don mthong bar bstan par spro'o //
K10D0353_H0361:313a-14: byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od dbus gsol pa /
K10D0353_H0361:313a-16: bdag ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i
K10D0353_H0361:313a-17: bde ba'i sbyin pa bgyi bar spro'o zhes byang chub
K10D0353_H0361:313a-18: sems dpa' de dag so so nas dam bcas so
K10D0353_H0361:313a-19: // byang chub yongs su brgyan cing /
K10D0353_H0361:313a-20: sems can thams cad la phan zhing bde ba dang /
K10D0353_H0361:313a-21: sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran zhing /
K10D0353_H0361:313a-22: sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin bsab pa'i phyir /
K10D0353_H0361:313a-23: stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K10D0353_H0361:313a-24: sangs rgyas kyi mdo sde 'di bdag cag la gtad du gsol /
K10D0353_H0361:313b-0: de'i tshe @313b tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K10D0353_H0361:313b-3: mdo sde 'di'i mtshan ci zhes bgyi /
K10D0353_H0361:313b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0353_H0361:313b-6: mdo sde 'di'i ming dge ba'i dngos po kun bsdu ba zhes kyang bya /
K10D0353_H0361:313b-7: thabs mkhas pa chen po zhes kyang bya /
K10D0353_H0361:313b-8: dgongs pa dam pa'i spyod pa zhes kyang bya /
K10D0353_H0361:313b-9: sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K10D0353_H0361:313b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo dang /
K10D0353_H0361:313b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0353_H0361:313b-12: khyed rnams ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du nan tan du spyod cig /
K10D0353_H0361:313b-13: sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gdams pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
K10D0353_H0361:313b-14: nyan thos bdun khri nyis stong gis /
K10D0353_H0361:313b-15: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:313b-25: de la sogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs bar gyur to //
K10D0353_H0361:313b-26: thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa'i mdo las /
K10D0353_H0361:313b-27: nye bar bsnyen pa'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o ////
K10D0353_H0361:313b-28: thabs mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas drin lan bsab pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so ////
